Su esposo labora a diario como jornalero, la casa en la que viven es propia.

La Señora Elvia pasa en casa dedicándose a los cuidados de su hogar, pero como tiene espacio se dedica a la cría de pollos, cuyes, cerdos y ganado, en sus terrenos se dedica a la agricultura y lo que cosecha es para el consumo de su hogar y si existe un sobrante lo vende. Por las noches o en sus tiempos libres se dedica a tejer sombreros de paja toquilla. 

Su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra pollos y alimento para sus animales. 

Su meta es tener un galpón de pollos más grande y agrandar la crianza de animales.

La foto pequeña es de una socia que no pudo estar presente cuando se tomo la foto del grupo.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank “Señoras de Taguan” (Ladies of Taguan) consists of eight women who engage in farm work, such as raising animals and growing crops. The youngest members work in the city, but their common goal is to help their families move forward and improve their economic stability. These members have also maintained the culture and traditions of their people. The women live in the canton of Sigsig, a place that is surrounded by lush vegetation. Despite the rugged terrain, the beautiful scenery makes it a pleasure to travel through this place.

One of the members of this group is Sra. Elvia. This is the first time she is participating in a loan alongside her friends and fellow group members of the “Señoras de Taguan” Communal Bank. She lives in the neighborhood of San Bartolo, which is in the canton of Sigsig.

Doña Elvia is 41 years old, married, and has five children (ages 21, 19, 15, 13, and 11). Her oldest daughter is married and lives independently. The second child, a son, helps out financially. The next two children are in high school and the youngest attends an elementary school in town. Her husband works every day as a farm laborer. They own the house in which they live.

Sra. Elvia stays at home and takes care of the household chores, but she also has a space set aside for raising chickens, guinea pigs, pigs, and cattle. She also has tracts of land for farming, so whatever she produces is set aside for household consumption. If there is a surplus, then she sells anything that is left over. In the evenings and in her spare time, Elvia makes woven straw hats. Her loan will be invested in the purchase of chickens and feed for her animals. Her goal is to have a larger chicken coop so that she can raise more animals.

The smaller photo is that of a member who was not present at the time the group photo was taken.

loans.use: to buy chickens and animal feed.

loans.name: Rossemary

texts.es: La Sra. Rossemary tiene 38 años,  tiene tres hijos de las edades de 11, 16 y 8 años, ella se dedica a la venta de variedad de refrescos en su puesto de venta que se encuentra en la localidad de Limoncito,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, La Sra. Rossemary va a usar este préstamo para la compra variedad de refrescos por mayor para surtir su puesto de venta   y  de esta manera brindar variedad de productos a sus clientes,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es seguir mejorando en su  negocio. La Sra. Rossemary es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz por la oportunidad brindada ya que este préstamo le permitirá crecer en su negocio.
texts.en:
Sra. Rossemary is 38 years old and has three children (ages 11, 16, and 8). She sells a variety of soft drinks from her vending stall in the town of Limoncito. This is her first loan with Emprender.

Sra. Rossemary will use this loan to buy a variety of soft drinks in bulk so that she can restock her vending stall and offer a variety of products to her customers. Her reason for requesting this loan is so that she can continue improving her business. Sra. Rossemary is a hardworking individual who is pleased with the opportunity this loan has given her so that she can grow her business.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks in bulk.

loans.name: Los Geranios Group

texts.es: Cordiales saludos. Este es el nuevo grupo “Los Geranios” conformada por 06 mujeres emprendedoras. Crecencia tiene 38 años de edad, casada con 02 hijos aún dependientes. Ella cuenta con una pequeña bodega la cual en su domicilio, este negocio surgió con los deseos de contar con un negocio propio y de esta manera poder brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia, es por ello que se esfuerza. Unos de sus sueños son de poner su puesto de lencerías y seguir ampliando su bodega. Con el fin de seguir mejorando solicitó su crédito para la compra de mercadería como arroz, azúcar, gaseosas y golosinas. El nuevo grupo “Los Geranios” agradece a los inversionistas Kiva por la ayuda brindada. Crecencia es la segunda del lado izquierdo y viste polo rojo.
texts.en:
The newly formed group, “Los Geranios” (The Geraniums), is made up of six women entrepreneurs, one of whom is Crecencia. Crecencia is 38 years old, and is married with two young children. She operates a small general store out of her house, a business that developed out of her desire to generate income and provide a better quality of life for her family, who are her motivation to work hard each and every day. 

One of Crecencia’s dreams is to expand and grow her business and to add clothing sales to her operation. She plans to use the support from this loan to purchase products to stock her store, including: rice, sugar, soft drinks, candy, etc. In the photo above, Crecencia is wearing a red shirt and is the woman seated on the couch second from the left. The Geraniums group is very grateful to Kiva lenders for their support

loans.use: to purchase various food products including, snacks, drinks and sweets to stock her general store.

loans.name: Mloganzila Group

texts.en:
Juma, who is in his early 30s, is married and has three children, one boy and two girls. He has been selling decoration equipment for two years now.  He works from 8.00 to 7.00 pm daily and is able to make a small monthly profit.

This will be Juma's fourth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  He used the previous loans to buy more advanced decoration equipment.  He has paid back all his loans successfully. With his profit he bought a plot of land, paid school fees, covered household expenses, and started building his house. He will use this loan to buy the missing items in his decoration business.  His dream is to one day be able to finish building his house.

He will use this loan with his loan group, Mloganzila, with 12 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy the missing items in his decoration equipment business.

loans.name: Tunecas 2 Group

texts.es:
La señora Cristina es madre soltera, cuenta con 27 años de edad, curso los 6 años de educacion primaria, tiene 2 hijos y 1 de ellos estudia, ella se dedica a la artesanía, específicamente a la elaboracion de fajas para damas, aprendio este trabajo ayudando a su madre y hasta el momento lleva 5 años de experiencia.

Organiza un grupo para poder solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de de hilos para la elaboracion de fajas. En el futuro no muy lejano quiere tener empleadas y entregar fajas por mayor; las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a la artesaria y a crianza de aves de corral.
texts.en:
Cristina is 27 years old, and is a single mother of two children, one of whom is in school. She was only able to complete six years of elementary school, and currently makes a living weaving artisanal clothing and crafts, specifically skirts and traditional women's girdles known as fajas. Cristina has five years of experience in this craft, a skill she learned while helping her mother with her weavings. Cristina plans to use the support from this loan to purchase various colors and styles of thread for use in weaving fajas and other artistic garments. In the near future, Cristina hopes to expand her business and to employ additional workers to weave skirts and fajas in larger quantities. 

The other members of the group make a living in similar artisan crafts, as well as raising small farm animals and birds for resale.

loans.use: to purchase thread for weaving skirts and traditional girdles.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy items to resell to her customers, like beans, flour, and onion

loans.name: Mirza Elizabeth

texts.es:
La Joven Mirza, de 24 años, vive con sus dos hijos, en su casa de habitación ubicada en un barrio San Lorenzo, en la zona sur de Honduras, se dedica desde hace 05 años a la venta de productos alimenticios en todas sus presentaciones.
Mirza vende de lunes a domingo y sus clientes son sus vecinos y amigos que la prefieren por su amabilidad y buen trato.
Mirza está solicitando  el préstamo para compra de productos alimenticios como refrescos, jugos, galletas, pan, manteca, frijoles, azúcar, arroz, aceite, pastas, salsas, sal, cubitos, etc. con el apoyo de este préstamo pretende incrementar mas su inventario y así también el volumen de sus ventas al tener todo tipo de productos para ofrecer a su clientela.
Mirza su sueño es tener un mercadito completo, donde se encuentre de todo tipo de productos.


San Lorenzo, Honduras - Febrero del 2013.
texts.en:
Mirza is a young woman of 24 who lives with her two children in a neighborhood of San Lorenzo in the south of Honduras.  For five years, Mirza has been selling all kinds of food products.

Mirza sells her products from Monday to Sunday.  Her customers are neighbors and friends who shop with her because she is friendly and provides good customer service.  Mirza is requesting this loan to buy food products such as soft drinks, juice, cookies, bread, butter, beans, sugar, rice, oil, pasta, sauces, salt, ice, etc.  With the support of this loan, she plans to further increase her inventory.  She will also increase her turnover as she will have all kinds of products available to sell to her customers.

Mirza's dream is to have a well-stocked business where her customers can find all kinds of products.

San Lorenzo, Honduras.  February 2013.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, juice, cookies, bread, butter, beans, sugar, rice, oil, pasta, sauces, salt, ice, etc. for her business

loans.name: G.s El Jobo Group

texts.es:
El señor  Pedro  de 60 años de edad, vive con su esposa en su casa de habitación, ubicada en una comunidad de San Lorenzo, al  sur de Honduras,  se dedica a la venta de granos básicos como se arroz, frijoles, maicillo, maíz . 
Don Pedro también los cultiva pero en temporada de verano vende bastante y es por  eso que cuando se le acaba tiene que comprar, su venta es de  lunes a domingo, y tiene bastante clientela porque la mayoría de las señoras que le compran van a vender tortillas al mercado de Nacaome. 
Don Pedro está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de maíz, maicillo, frijoles, arroz y de más productos que vende para así tener más venta y mejorar sus ingresos. 
Don Pedro  al igual que sus demás compañeros de grupo desean salir a delante con sus negocios y mejorar un poco su calidad de vida y las de sus familias.
Doña  Irma tiene un negocio de venta de abarrotería y venta de lociones.
Don Omar también es venta de abarrotería y todo tipo de productos alimenticios,  todos tiene su propia actividad productiva.
	
San Lorenzo, Honduras –  Febrero del 2013
texts.en:
60-year-old Pedro lives with his wife in their home which is located in a community in San Lorenzo, in the south of Honduras.  His business is selling basic grains such as rice, beans, sorghum and corn.

Pedro grows these crops but, as he sells a lot during the summer, he has to buy more when he runs out.  He makes his sales Monday through Sunday and has quite a lot of customers.  Most of the ladies who buy from him sell tortillas in Nacaome market.

Pedro and his fellow group members would like to make progress in their businesses and improve their families' quality of life a little.

Irma has a business selling groceries and also sells lotions.  Omar sells groceries and lots of different food products.  Each member of the group has their own business.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - February 2013.

loans.use: to buy corn, sorghum, beans and rice for his business

loans.name: La Cenicienta Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Luisa mujer de 60 años de edad, acompañada, tiene dos hijos mayores de edad, tiene 8 años dedicarse a comercializar cosméticos de la Avon y venta de artesanía al país Guatemala, anteriormente era docente que esta jubilada y tiene un pariente  que es una hija de ella que le ayuda a vender los productos, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de artesanías como hamacas de las grandes, cotonas, guayaberas, chinos de mecate etc. Filomena  tiene 45 años de edad y vende cosméticos de la Avon y Concepción mujer de 45 años y vende ropa, zapatos, cosméticos de la Avon etc.
texts.en:
This group consists of three enterprising members. One of them is a 60-year-old woman named Luisa. She is married and has two grown children. Luisa has been selling Avon cosmetics and handicrafts from Guatemala for the past eight years. She previously worked as a teacher, but is now retired. Luisa is now in a partnership with her daughter, who helps her with selling these products. Her loan will be invested in the purchase of handicrafts such as large hammocks, woven cotton shirts, “guayaberas”, corduroy slacks, and other items.

Filomena, age 45, sells Avon cosmetics. Concepción is also 45 years old and sells clothing, shoes, Avon cosmetics, and other products.

loans.use: to buy large hammocks, woven cotton shirts, “guayaberas”, corduroy slacks, and other items.

loans.name: Chipotrer Group

texts.es:
La señora Isabel Maria de estado civil soltera, tiene 22 años de edad, no curso ni un año la escuela, se dedica a la elaboracion de bordado de blusas, aprendió e inició este trabajo por la enseñanza de su madre y hasta la fecha lleva 5 años de experiencia.

Organiza un grupo para poder solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra de materiales como hilo, lustrina y telas para la elaboracion de bordado de blusas. En el futuro quiere ver su negocio prospero con mas capital para poder seguir trabajando; las demás integrantes de grupo se dedican a bordados, comercio y crianza de animales doméstico.
texts.en:
Isabel María, 22, is single.  She didn't attend school for a single year.  She earns a living embroidering blouses.  She learned and started this job because of her mother's instruction, and at present has five years of experience.

She's organizing a group to be able to request a loan to use to buy materials such as thread, silk cloth, and fabric to embroider blouses.

In the future she wants her business to be prosperous, with more capital to be able to continue working.

The other members of the group work in embroidery, commerce, and raising domestic animals.

loans.use: to buy silk cloth for embroidery

loans.name: Kalimer

texts.en:
Kalimer is from the Syunik region, which is famous for its severe cold climate. The best agricultural business for the locals is cattle farming and some limited land cultivation. Kalimer is engaged in cattle breeding. She keeps two cows, one mother pig, and six little pigs. Kalimer gets milk and milk products and her husband Artak sells them in the local market. This is the only source of income for their young family, so she and her husband work hard to gather more milk and earn income from the sales. As the farm is small and their income is hardly enough for covering daily costs, Kalimer has applied for this loan. The money from the loan will be used to expand the farm by purchasing two cows and a calf.
 
This is very important for Kalimer to get more milk and sell it. She dreams to have a big farm and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to pay for two cows and a calf

loans.name: Raya

texts.en:
Raya has been trading women’s clothing and underwear from a rented shop in one of the city’s markets. In the past, Raya used to travel to the neighboring countries to purchase inventory. Now, Raya puts her orders through other traders so she can spend more time managing the shop. Currently Raya would like to expand the variety of the stock in order to meet clients' demands and stay competitive in the market. Therefore, she has applied for this loan to purchase new women's clothing. This will significantly increase the sales and her income.

Raya lives with her husband and daughter and works hard to provide for them appropriate living conditions.

loans.use: to buy new women's clothing to sell to customers

loans.name: Asia

texts.en: Ms. Asia is a 44-year-old married woman and a mother of three children.  She strives hard to meet their demands including food, clothing and health. In order to contribute to the family income, she has been running a cloth-trading business for many years. By this time, she has become famous in her community for selling good quality fabric. She has a varied customer base and is able to earn enough through her business. Asia requested a loan of Rs 50,000 from the Kashf Foundation to buy a wide variety of cloths in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her inventory. She is in her 7th loan cycle with a good repayment history. Asia expects a boost in her earnings with her loan and plans to spend part of her profits on the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: To buy a wide variety of cloths in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her inventory

loans.name: Karen

texts.en:
Karen has been involved in beekeeping for more than 10 years. He keeps 110 colonies of bees, from which he gets high-quality honey. As honey is a must-have item for each household in the region, there are always plenty of buyers of quality honey.

Karen has applied for this loan so he will be able to purchase 20 more colonies of bees, and to renovate the old beehives. This is very important, for him to expand his beekeeping business and meet customer demand.

Karen lives in Goris town, with his wife and two children. He does his best and works hard, to gather high income and ensure a better life for his family.

loans.use: to pay for 20 new colonies of bees and to renovate the 110 old beehives

loans.name: Amada Pastora

texts.es: Amada  conocida  en su barrio como doña amada habita en la ciudad de Estelí, madre de tres hijos todos mayores de edad, ella  vive con su esposo y una nieta. Es atravez de su pulpería   que logro independencia económica y aportar para su hogar pues su esposo quedo incapacitado después de un accidente y tuvo que apoyarlo para levantarse juntos de nuevo y seguir adelante.  Ella considera que su negocio.es bueno y que el punto donde está ubicada es excelente para su venta pues la afluencia de clientes es constante pasa mucha gente de las fábricas de tabaco. Sus metas próximas son la compra de productos de Mayor demanda que se mueven bastante su meta futura  es mejorar el espacio físico donde tiene ubicada la pulpería  para mejor satisfacción de sus cliente el crédito lo quiere para comprar arroz azúcar, harina, maíz, aceite, condimentos, golosinas y gaseosas  ella dice que este crédito le ayudara mucho ya que tendrá para surtir  y podrá mejorar su negocio.
texts.en:
Amanda is known in her neighborhood as the beloved matron of the town of Estelí. She is the mother to three grown children, and she lives with her husband and her granddaughter. Through starting her own general store, Amanda has been able to gain financial security and independence for her family. Her husband was paralyzed in an accident, and her family has had to start a new chapter with Amanda shouldering all the financial responsibility. She is very happy with her business as well as its location, since it is along the main road that all of the employees from the nearby tobacco factory travel to and from work each day.

Amanda's future goals are to grow and expand her business and to improve the space of her home that is dedicated to the store. She hopes the changes she makes will in turn provide a higher quality experience and service to her clients. Amanda is very grateful for this opportunity, and she plans to use the support from this loan to purchase merchandise to stock her general store, including: rice, sugar, flour, corn, oil, condiments, soft drinks, candy, etc.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, flour, corn, oil, condiments, soft drinks, candy and other food items to stock her general store.

loans.name: Kathreen

texts.en: Ms. Kathreen had a difficult time after her husband's business failure. This compelled her to start her own business to support her family for a better future. Ten years ago, she began sewing in her house. She sews for the people in her community and uses the income to support her entire family. She is very well-known in the art of stitching and has attained a regular list of customers. To help her continue the operations of her business, she requested a loan of Rs 20,000 to buy threads in different colors with packs of zippers, buttons and laces to meet her customers' demands. In addition to repaying the loan, she will use part of her revenue to deal with personal expenses.

loans.use: To buy threads in different colors with packs of zippers, buttons and laces to meet her customers' demands

loans.name: Madelin Suyapa

texts.es:
La Joven Madelin, de 22 años, en su casa de habitación ubicada en un barrio de San Lorenzo, en la zona sur de Honduras, se dedica desde hace 05  años a la venta de productos alimenticios en todas sus presentaciones.
Madelin  su negocio está ubicado en el local de su casa.
Madelin está solicitando  el préstamo para compra de manteca, huevos, aceite, papel higiénico, pollo, carne, embutidos, pastas de tomate, espaguetis, refrescos etc. y abarrotería en general, con el apoyo de este préstamo pretende incrementar mas su inventario y por ende sus ganancias, para así poder salir cumplir con sus compromisos. 
Madelin su sueño es poder terminar sus estudios Universitarios. 


San Lorenzo, Honduras -  Febrero del 2013.
texts.en:
Madelin is 22 years old, and she operates a small grocery store from her home in the town of San Lorenzo, which is located in the south of honduras. She has five years of experience running the store, and has learned much in the process of launching her own business.

With the support from this loan, Madelin plans to purchase food items to stock her store, including: butter, eggs, oil, toilet paper, chicken, red meat, canned goods, tomato sauce, spaghetti, drinks, etc. She hopes that this investment will help her to expand her business and inventory so that she can offer a wider variety of products to her clients and improve her quality of life. Madelin's dream is to one day finish receive her university degree.

loans.use: to purchase butter, eggs, oil, chicken, red meat, canned goods, tomato sauce, spaghetti, drinks, toilet paper, etc. to stock her grocery store.

loans.name: Luz María

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal La Inmaculada, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.

En este lugar vive la señora Luz, tiene 45 años, es madre soltera de cuatro hijos de 30, 28, 22 y 20 años, todos viven en su casa la ultima está estudiando en la Universidad. 

Doña Luz tiene una tienda en su casa, vende productos como  arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, etc. Trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, sus hijos le ayudan en su trabajo, los productos los compra en el centro de Tosagua aunque la mayoría de sus productos los recibe en su local, lleva 4 años con su negocio que lo empezó con el primer crédito que recibió del banco por lo cual esta agradecida ya que es así como ella puede solventar los gastos del hogar y los estudios de su hija.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, embutidos y otros productos de primera necesidad. Está en el Banco Comunal desde hace 4 años  y le gusta la ayuda que le dieron para empezar su negocio que hoy le permite ganarse el sustento de su familia.
 
Su sueño es que su hija sea profesional.
texts.en:
The “La Inmaculada” communal bank meets every two weeks in the city of Tosagua.  This place is known for being very dynamic and most of its residents are farmers and raise animals.  It’s a vegetation-rich zone.
 
Luz is 45 years old and is the single mother of four children, ages 30, 28, 22, and 20.  All live at home and her youngest daughter studies at university.

Luz has a store in her home where she sells products such as rice, sugar, cooking oils, detergents, etc.  She works daily from 6:00 am to 8:00 pm and sometimes later.  Her children help her with her work and she buys her products in downtown Tosagua, although she gets most of her products locally.  She’s been doing this for four years and began with the money from the first loan she received from the bank, for which she is very happy because she can pay her expenses and for her daughter’s education.

She will use the money from this loan to stock her store and buy rice, sugar, cooking oil, detergents, sausages, and other primary needs products.  She has been with the communal bank for four years and she likes the help she got for starting her business which now allows her to earn a living and support her family.

Her dream is for her daughter to become a professional.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Nosheen

texts.en: Ms. Nosheen is a 35-year-old married woman. She has been in a beauty parlor business for the past three years. She offers many services to her customers such as make-up, hair styling, and facials. Through her services, she has become very famous on her street. In order to meet the increasing demands of her customers, she is interested in buying a greater variety of cosmetic products for the parlor.  Since she is short on cash, she contacted Kashf Foundation to apply for her first loan. She needs a loan of Rs 20,000 to buy hair-care products, skin products, bleach creams, and whitening-products in large quantities. She hopes to cater to more customers in time. She shared her dream of running a training center for girls to teach them skills so they can start a business and earn money for themselves.

loans.use: To buy hair-care products, skin products, bleach creams, and whitening-products in large quantities

loans.name: Haneen

texts.en: Haneen is a 23-year-old sister to three, younger siblings. Haneen and her sisters are all university students which increases the financial load on their parents. For that reason, Haneen is applying for a loan to pay for her own semester fees. She is majoring in finance and banking.

loans.use: to pay for her university semester fees.

loans.name: Ruben Alonso

texts.es: Rubén habita en la ciudad de Estelí,  él se dedica a la de venta de bananos y granos básicos siendo su principal negocio los bananos los cuales los debe ir a traer a la montaña el empezó en este negocio hace dos años con fondos propios ha sido su primer negocio el siente que desde que le dimos el primer crédito ha mejorado mucho su calidad de vida porque ha incrementado sus ventas y ha metido otros productos como leña y granos básicos el siente que ha sido un progreso. Ahora él está solicitando el nuevo crédito para comprar bananos y granos como frijoles maíz y trigo el próximo paso será la renovación de su crédito para invertir en comprar de granos básicos y también impulsar la venta de café.
texts.en:
Rubén lives in the city of Estelí, and makes a living selling bananas and staple grains such as beans, corn and wheat. His focus is banana sales, and he makes frequent trips up into the mountains to bring the fruit to town for resale. Rubén began his business two years ago with his own savings, and he feels that, since receiving his first loan, he has increased his sales and improved his quality of life significantly. As his business has grown, Rubén has added firewood and staple grains to his operation.

With the support from this loan, Rubén plans to purchase bananas, beans, corn and wheat for resale, as well as expand his business to include selling coffee.

loans.use: to purchase bananas, beans, corn and wheat.

loans.name: Iccel Amanda

texts.es: Iccel, una joven madre que se preocupa por el bienestar de sus hijos para que tengan un buen futuro por delante, por esta razón trabaja a diario junto a su esposo quien ahora es comerciante, para que así en conjunto lograr sus objetivos, este doceavo crédito que solicita es para invertirle un poco más a la venta con productos de mayor demanda como lo son granos básicos, lácteos, carnes, productos para el aseo del hogar y del cuerpo, esta inversión le permitirá mantener siempre la clientela y sus ingresos fijos.
texts.en:
Iccel is a young mother who is dedicated to her children and determined to provide a bright future for them. Her husband is a salesman, and they both work hard every day to fulfill their goals and dreams and support their family. 

With the support from this, her twelfth loan, Iccel plans to purchase staple grains, dairy products, meat and other food products to stock her general store. She hopes that this investment will help her to strengthen her business, offer a wider variety of products to her clients and generate income.

loans.use: to purchase staple grains, dairy products, meat and other items to stock her general store.

loans.name: Benik

texts.en:
Benik is from Avshar village, in Ararat region. He has been involved in agriculture for more than 10 years. Benik runs a farm that currently includes 35 chickens, and apricot, plum and cherry trees. Benik works hard to sustain his family, which consists of his wife and 33-year-old son.

Realizing that the farming business is the only source of income for the family, Benik would like to expand it. He has applied for this loan to purchase land and cultivate different kinds of fruits and vegetables. This is very important, for Benik to have this land, start the new cultivation, and expand his farm.

loans.use: to purchase land for cultivation, and to begin growing new kinds of fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Katy

texts.es: Katy tiene 21 años de edad y es soltera, ella nació en la ciudad del Cusco pero actualmente vive en la ciudad de Saylla. Su actividad económica principal de Katy es la venta de materiales de construcción como arena, piedra, yeso y otras cosas más. Ya son varios años que se dedica  al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su labor.  Katy también está estudiando la carrera profesional de contabilidad en una universidad de la ciudad del Cusco. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como arena. Su sueño es  terminar su carrera profesional.
texts.en:
Katy is 21 years old, single, and is from the city of Cuzco, though she currently lives in the city of Saylla. Katy makes a living selling construction materials, including: sand, stone, plaster, mortar and other products. She has several years of experience in this trade, and she believes that business is going well because she is extremely dedicated to and positive about her work. 

In addition to running her business, Katy is also studying accounting at the University of Cuzco. Her goal is to complete her university studies. She plans to use the support from this loan to purchase sand and other construction materials for resale.

loans.use: to purchase sand and other construction materials for resale at her business.

loans.name: Santos Anselmo

texts.es:
Anselmo, de 56 años de edad, casado, padre de un hijo, vive en la ciudad de Estelí , desde hace ocho años él se dedica a la venta de pollo y carnes en su puesto de venta en el mercado tiene una pequeña hija de catorce años de edad  la cual está estudiando la secundaria. Él está solicitando este crédito para comprar pollo, carnes y huevos. 
El empezó este negocio con fondos propios ya que el trabajo  como vendedor pero deseaba tener un  negocio propio con la experiencia adquirida en su anterior trabajo. Así fue que decidió poner la venta de carnes y pollos  ha resultado un negocio rentable con el mantiene a su familia paga los gastos del hogar y los estudios de su hija. Dentro de sus planes futuros él quiere ampliar el negocio contratar más personal de trabajo abrir otro puesto de venta sus metas próximas son rellenar su inventario para estar listo y ofrecer productos a su clientela.
texts.en:
Anselmo is 56 years old and married, and he has one daughter who is in high school. Anselmo lives in the city of Estelí, and has worked for the past eight years selling chicken and other meats at his stall in the local market. He is requesting this loan in order to purchase chicken, meat and eggs to stock his business.

Anselmo started up his business with his own savings and a desire to run his own business with skills acquired from previous jobs. His business selling chicken and other meats has done well, and it has helped him to support his family and to cover household expenses and his daughter's education. His future plans include expanding and growing his business and hiring employees to staff a second market stall. He hopes this investment will help him to replenish his inventory and offer high quality products to his clients.

loans.use: to purchase chicken, meat and eggs.

loans.name: Matilde

texts.es: Matilde tiene 22 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre  de la cual tiene un hijo, ella nació en la ciudad de Paucartambo pero actualmente vive en la ciudad de Saylla. Matilde trabaja como cocinera para una señora que vende platos típicos de la región, pero su actividad complementaria es la crianza de animales menores como cuyes y chanchos. Ya son varios años que se dedica  a la crianza de animales menores y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su labor.  Matilde en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar cuyes. Su sueño es  abrir un restaurante.
texts.en:
Matilde, 22, is in a common-law relationship and they have one son. She was born in the city of Paucartambo but currently lives in the city of Sayalla. 

Matilde works as a cook for a woman who sells typical dishes from the region. She also has a side business raising small animals such as guinea pigs and pigs. 

She has been raising small animals for several years and it is going very well thanks to the effort she puts into her work. 

At this time Matilde is asking for a loan to buy guinea pigs. Her dream is to open a restaurant.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs. Her dream is to open a restaurant.

loans.name: Faustina

texts.es: Faustina tiene 45 años de edad y es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene cinco hijos, ella nació en la ciudad de Huasao pero actualmente vive en la ciudad de Saylla. Su actividad económica principal de Faustina es la venta de verduras y la crianza de animales menores como cuyes y chanchos. Ya son varios años que se dedica  al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su labor.  Faustina también tiene un pequeño restaurante donde vende cuyes al horno y otros platos típicos. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar cuyes.
texts.en:
Faustina is 45 years old, and is married with five children. She was born in the city of Huasao, but currently lives in the city of Saylla. Faustina makes a living selling vegetables and raising small animals, such as pigs and guinea pigs. She has been working in this trade for several years, and she believes that business is going well because of all her hard work and dedication to her business and clients. 

In addition to her retail business, Faustina also runs a small restaurant where she cooks up savory, traditional dishes, including roast guinea pig and other delicious options. She plans to use the support from this loan to purchase guinea pigs for her businesses.

loans.use: to purchase guinea pigs for resale at her business.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El cliente vive en Guayaquil. El tiene 33 años de edad. El empezó hace muchos años  vendiendo artículos para el hogar, pero después  cayó gravemente  enfermo y por su condición empezaron a bajar los ingresos al hogar. El comenzó a tomar productos naturales por su salud y luego empezó a vendérselas a sus familiares y amigos.

El vende sus productos naturales solo y lo realiza, desde las 9:00 de la mañana hasta las 19:00 de la noche. La dificultad que se le presenta en su trabajo es su enfermedad la cual no le permite realizar su trabajo con normalidad ya que es pvvs (paciente viviendo con Vih Sida). El no está casado, y tampoco tiene hijos.

El usara el préstamo para comprar productos naturales para venderlos a sus amistades y amigos. El desea para el  futuro poder ampliar su negocio crear una red de venta de productos naturales, para dar oportunidad de trabajo a más personas que tienen el mismo problema que el, quiere permanecer junto a su familia y poder tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
The borrower lives in Guayaquil and is 33 years old. He began selling items for the home many years ago, but later fell seriously ill and because of his condition began to draw down the household income. He began to take natural products for his health and then began to sell them to family members and friends.

He sells his natural products on his own and does it from 9:00 in the morning until 7:00 in the evening. The difficulty that arises in his work is his illness, which does not allow him to carry on his work normally, as he is a person living with HIV/AIDS. He is not married, nor does he have children.

He will use the loan to buy natural products to sell them to his friends and acquaintances. He wishes in the future to be able to expand his business to create a natural products sales network, so that he can give work opportunities to more people who have the same problem as him. He wants to remain with his family and be able to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy natural products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, iron, cement blocks, stone and other construction materials.

loans.name: Remigia

texts.es: Remigia tiene 61 años de edad y es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene cuatro hijos, ella nació en la ciudad de Saylla y vive en la misma ciudad de Saylla. Su actividad económica principal de Remigia es la venta de un plato típico llamado chicharon. Ya son varios años que se dedica  al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su labor.  Remigia tiene un pequeño restaurante donde expende sus productos. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar carne de chancho.
texts.en:
Remigia, 61, is married and the fruit of this beautiful relationship is four children. 

She was born in the city of Saylla and lives in the same city of Saylla. 

Her main source of income is selling a typical dish called chicharon [pork cracklings].

She has had her business for several years and it is going very well thanks to the effort she puts into her work. 

Remiga has a small restaurant where she sells her products. 

At this time she is asking for a loan to buy pork.

loans.use: to buy pork

loans.name: Cecilio

texts.es: Cecilio tiene 67 años de edad y es casado y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene dos hijos, él nació en la ciudad de Saylla y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació. Su actividad económica principal de Cecilio es la venta de productos suplementarios pero él y su esposa tienen una pequeña tienda de abarrotes donde expende sus productos como arroz, azúcar, fideos y otras cosas. Ya son varios años que se dedica  al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su labor. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como sacos de arroz y sacos de azúcar.
texts.en:
Cecilio is 67 years old, married and they have two children. He was born in the town of Saylla and lives in the same town where he was born. Cecilio's main work is selling feed supplements, but he and his wife have a small grocery store where he sells his products such as rice, sugar, noodles and other items. 

He has had his business for several years now and it is going very well thanks to the effort he puts into his work. On this occasion he needs the loan to buy merchandise, such as sacks of rice and sacks of sugar.

loans.use: To buy merchandise such as sacks of rice and sacks of sugar.

loans.name: Etanislado

texts.es:
Don Etanislado es un humilde agricultor, casado, padre de 8 hijos, mayores de edad, es dueño de una pulpería en la que vende todos los productos básicos que consumen a diarios sus clientes como arroz, azúcar, frijoles, además de su pulpería tiene sus vaquitas, la cual ha ido comprando. 
Inicio su actividad agrícola a la edad de 20 años trabajando como jornalero, luego decidió dedicarse a la siembra de pastos para sus animales, el cada día  lucha a diario para ganarse el sustento de su familia, fue asi que el decidió independizarse  y trabajar muy duramente para obtener ingresos extras, el junto a su esposa han luchado por salir adelante, el siempre paga mano de obra en sus labores diarias, sus expectativas es seguir creciendo en su negocio para que le genere mas ganancias.
Don Estanilado está solicitando el crédito para comprar alambre, pagar mano de obra, para reparar la cercar en donde tiene sus animales, el cual será de mucha ayuda porque podrá salir adelante con los trabajos que tiene que realizar en su finca, de esta manera podrá obtener mejor pastos para sus vacas.
texts.en:
Estanislado is a humble farmer.  He is married and has 8 adult children.  He owns a grocery store where he sells basic household products such as rice, sugar and beans.  In addition, he also keeps cows. 

Estanislado started farming at the age of 20, working as a day laborer.  He later decided to start growing pasture for his own animals.  Every day he works hard in order to support his family.  This is the reason he decided to start working for himself, working very hard to make extra income.  Estanislado and his wife have both worked hard to make progress in life.  Estanislado always pays his laborers for their daily work.  His goal is to continue growing his business so that he can make more profits.

Estanislado is requesting this loan to buy wire and pay laborers to repair his animal pen.  This will help him as he will be able to make progress with the work on his farm.  He will be able to grow the best pasture possible for his cows.

loans.use: to buy wire and pay laborers to fix his animal pen

loans.name: Miriam Janeth

texts.es:
La Señora Miriam está realizando su primer crédito en el banco comunal Las Toquilleras, ha sido invitada a formar parte de este hermoso grupo por sus compañeras y vecinas. Vive en el cantón del Sigsig lugar que goza de una belleza natural ya que se encuentra rodeado de varias montañas y verdes campos, su arquitectura es una mezcla de lo antiguo con lo moderno, su gente es amable, gentil y de un gran corazón, mantienen su cultura y tradiciones.

La Señora Miriam tiene 30 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido un hijo de 8 años que estudia en una escuelita de la localidad. Su esposo es de profesión chofer y presta sus servicios en el transporte público, la casa en la viven es propia.

Doña Miriam labora de lunes a viernes como profesora y es toda una profesional en esta rama, trasmite sus conocimientos a sus alumnos desde hace 6 años. En sus tiempos libres a más de dedicarse a su hogar vende bisutería, ropa y cosméticos a sus amigas, vecinas y compañeras. 

Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de ropa y cosméticos para continuar creciendo en este negocio. 

Su meta es tener un local propio en donde pueda vender toda su mercadería.
texts.en:
Miriam is asking for for her first loan from The Las Toquilleras Communal Bank. She has been invited to join this beautiful group by her colleagues and neighbors. 

She lives in the Sigsig district. An area that boasts of natural beauty and is surrounded by several mountains and green fields. The architecture is a mix of old and modern, the people are friendly, gentle and have a big heart and they maintain their culture and traditions. 

Miriam is 30, married and the fruit of this union is an eight year old son who studies at a local school. Her husband is a public transport driver and they own their house. 

For the past 6 years, Miriam has worked  Monday through Friday as a teacher and is very professional. 

During her free time she sells costume jewelry, clothes and cosmetics out of her home to her friends, neighbors and colleagues. 

She will use this loan to invest in new clothes and cosmetics to keep growing her business. 

Her goal is to have her own store where she can sell her merchandise.

loans.use: to buy clothes and cosmetics.

loans.name: Carmen Soledad

texts.es:
La Señora. Carmen forma parte del banco comunal Las Toquilleras, este es su segundo crédito y empezó con los créditos gracias a que una amiga que le invito y ahora ha estrechado aun más los lasos de amistad con todas sus amigas y compañeras. Vive en el cantón Sigsig lugar que goza de una belleza natural ya que se encuentra rodeado de varias montañas y verdes campos, su arquitectura es una mezcla de lo antiguo con lo moderno, su gente es amable, gentil y de un gran corazón, aun mantienen su cultura y tradiciones.

La Señora. Carmen tiene 30 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos de 7 y 3 años de edad, su primera hija estudia en una escuelita de la localidad. Su esposo labora en el negocio familia que es una lavadora de vehículos, no tiene casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.

Doña Camen trabaja con su esposo en el negocio familiar que es una lavadora y lubricadora de vehículos, tienen este negocio desde hace 4 años y por el momento les va muy bien, le gusta este trabajo ya que tiene el tiempo para estar pendiente de su familia.

Su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de aceites, líquidos de frenos y pulimento para automóviles. 

Su meta es crecer en el negocio y en el futuro ofrecerles más servicios a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Carmen is part of the "Las Toquilleras" communal bank. This is her second loan  She started with the loans thanks to a friend who invited her, and has now formed even closer bonds of friendship with all her friends and fellow members. 

She lives in the Sigsig canton, a place which enjoys natural beauty as it is surrounded by various mountains and green fields. Its architecture is a mix of the old and the modern. Its people are kind, friendly, with big hearts, and still maintain their culture and traditions. 

Carmen is 30 years old, married and has two children ages 7 and 3. Her eldest daughter goes to a local primary school. Her husband works in the family business, which is a car wash. They do not have their own home, so they rent. 

Carmen works with her husband in the family business, which is a car wash and oil change service. They have had this business for four years and at the moment it is going very well. She likes this work because she has time to look after her family. She's going to use her loan to buy oil, brake fluid and auto polish. Her goal is to see her business grow, and in future offer her customers more services.

loans.use: To buy oil, brake fluid and auto polish.

loans.name: Sultana

texts.en:
Sultana is a married woman and a mother of four. For six years, she has been doing the business of stitching to support her husband. She accepted the fact that, if her husband works alone for their family, they will not be able to meet the expenses of the household with the educational needs of children. That is why she started stitching at home to contribute to the family income. She, together with her husband, manages their household while operating a business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses. 

Now, she requests a loan of PKR 25000/- to purchase more reels of thread, along with packs of buttons and laces, etc. In this way, she will be able to meet the increasing demand of her customers. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. Sultana hopes to grow her business and dreams of giving a good and quality education to her children, through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to purchase more reels of thread, along with packs of buttons and laces, etc.

loans.name: Parveen

texts.en:
Parveen is a 44-year-old, married woman. She has been manufacturing shoes for the past 25 years. She beautifully makes them at home and then sells them in the local market. By now, she has attained a regular list of customers and she makes enough money to contribute to the family's income. Her husband works as a laborer and earns insufficient income to support his family alone. She is a mother of five children and is motivated to provide for her family. 

To cope with the increasing demand of her customers, she requested a loan of PKR 35,000 to purchase thread, soles, and leather material in large quantity, to increase her production. She hopes to get a boost in her earnings through her greater sales. She is in her third loan cycle and has shown excellent repayment behavior. Parveen is very much thankful to Kashf Foundation for its tremendous support.

loans.use: to purchase thread, soles, and leather material in large quantity.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana tiene 70 años de edad y es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene dos hijos, ella nació en la ciudad de Yanaoca pero vive en la ciudad de Saylla. Su actividad económica principal de Juana es la venta de productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, leche, aceite, atunes, pan, detergentes, gaseosas y otras cosas más entonces ella tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes en su domicilio donde expende sus productos a sus vecinos. Ya son varios años que se dedica  al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su labor. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como sacos de arroz y sacos de azúcar.
texts.en: Juana is 70 years old. She's married, and from this beautiful relationship she has two children. She was born in the town of Yanaoca, but lives in the town of Saylla. Juana's main business is selling household staples such as rice, sugar, milk, olive oil, tuna, bread, detergent, soft drinks and other items. She runs a small grocery store in her house where she sells the products to her neighbors. She has been in this line of work for several years and it's going very well, thanks to how hard she works at it. On this occasion she requests a loan in order to purchase merchandise such as sacks of rice and sacks of sugar.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise such as sacks of rice and sacks of sugar.

loans.name: Jose Manuel

texts.es:
Jose Manuel tiene 35 años  es casado tiene tres hijos, vive con la esposa y con los hijos en Guaranda provincia de Bolívar.

Es integrante de la Vrc Nuevos Horizontes, la comunidad se encuentra a unos 40 minutos en la comunidad santa Martha perteneciente al Cantón Guaranda.

Jose se dedica  a la agricultura a la siembra de mora y naranjilla además cría pollos y ganados.

Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, abonos,  fertilizantes,  urea, balanceado. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los abonos y mejorar la producción.

El sueño es poder agrandar la agricultura y obtener mejores utilidades para poder trabajar con ese dinero. En el tiempo libre le gusta salir de paseo con la familia.
texts.en:
Jose Manuel is 35 years old. He's married and has three children. He lives with his wife and children in Guaranda, province of Bolívar.

He's a member of the "Nuevos Horizontes" ("New Horizons") communal bank, which is located about 40 minutes from the community of Santa Martha, which belongs to the canton of Guaranda.

Jose is a farmer. He grows blackberries and naranjillas, and he also raises chickens and cattle.

He requests the loan in order to purchase seeds, compost, fertilizer, urea and balanced feed. With the help of this loan he'll be able to by the compost and improve his production.

His dream is to be able to expand his agriculture business and improve his profits so he can use this money for work. In his free time he enjoys going out for a stroll with his family.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, compost, fertilizer, urea and balanced feed.

loans.name: Inomjon

texts.ru: Иномджон начинающий пастух.   Вот уже год как занимается скотоводством.  Раньше Иномчон  ездил в РФ на заработки. Работал там  разнорабочим.  Но в связи с трудностями в трудовой миграции Иномджон решил вернуться и на родине зарабатывать и кормить семью.  Его соседи посоветовали ему заняться разведением скота и от этого получать доход.  У него жена и один ребёнок.  Он живёт с родителями и  заботиться о них. Кроме скотоводство, Иномджон занимается дехканским хозяйством.  Пользуется каждой свободной минуткой и зарабатывает себе на жизнь. У Иномджона пять голов баранов и 3 коровы.  Он часто выводит их на пастбище но несмотря на это ему нужна закупить  корм и запастись. Так же Иномджону необходимы денежные средства  для купли дополнительного скота. С этими целями обратился в МДО «Арванд». Надеется на помощь со стороны организации  и заранее благодарит за содействие.
texts.en: Inomjon is a novice shepherd who has been working with livestock for one year.  Before that, he was a migrant worker in Russia.  He worked there as a laborer.  However, due to the difficulties of labor immigration, Inomjon decided to return to his homeland to work and provide for his family.  His neighbors advised him to breed livestock as a source of income.  He has a wife and a baby.  He lives with and cares for his parents.  Besides livestock, Inomjon also farms.  He uses every available moment to provide for his family.  He has 5 sheep and 3 cows.  He often takes them out to pasture, however he still needs to buy and stock up on feed.  He also needs funds to buy additional animals.  With these goals, he has turned to Arvand.  He relies on help from the organization and is grateful in advance for your assistance.

loans.use: to buy cattle and feed

loans.name: Sumaira

texts.en: Ms. Sumaira is a 32-year-old married woman and a mother of one. She has been running a business of trading cloths for the past six months. She purchases a variety of cloth from the main city and then sells it to people in her vicinity. She has become famous for selling good quality cloth in her community. Sumaira requested a loan of PKR 25,000 from Kashf Foundation to buy stocks of different cloth for the summer season, taking into account the choices and tastes of her customers. In this way, she would be able to earn more income through greater sales. She hopes to have a good experience with this new loan and wants to expand her business. She dreams of giving a good and quality education to her child through all her hard efforts in her business.

loans.use: to buy stocks of different cloth for the summer season, taking into account the choices and tastes of her customers.

loans.name: Khalida

texts.en: Ms. Khalida had a difficult time after her husband's business failure. She decided to work with her husband and to support her family for a better future. Twelve years ago she began stitching work in her house. She stitches for the people living around her house and uses the income to support her entire family. However, due to lack of availability of funds she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers, so she requested a loan of PKR 20,000 from Kashf Foundation. She intends to use this loan amount to buy spools of threads with packs of needles, buttons and zippers. She expects gain in her net income and wishes to spend part of the profits for the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to buy spools of threads with packs of needles, buttons and zippers.

loans.name: Shazia

texts.en:
Ms. Shazia is 38 years old and a married woman and mother of five children, three daughters and two sons. She is striving hard to meet their demands, including food, clothing, and health expenses.  She, together with her husband, is doing a business of tailoring and earns enough to run their household. The man shown in the photo is Shazia’s husband. She initiated her business with the support of Kashf Foundation; she took out her first loan to buy a sewing machine. At present, she enjoys a great client list and has gained a lot of appreciation and popularity in her community. 

In order to meet the customers’ orders on time, she requested a loan of Rs 35,000 to buy a stock of thread with packs of laces and ribbons in various colors. Then she would be able to meet the demand of her customers without fail.  Shazia hopes to grow her business and dreams of giving a good and quality education to her children through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to buy a stock of thread with packs of laces and ribbons in various colors.

loans.name: Shabana

texts.en:
Mrs Shabana is a married woman and a mother of four. She has been doing a business of stitching for the past 12 years, to help her husband. She accepted the fact that if her husband, alone, worked to support their family, they would not be able to meet the expenses of the household, with the educational needs of the children. That is why she started stitching at home -- to support her family well.

Together with her husband, she manages their household while operating a business. She is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses. Now, she requested a loan of Rs. 30,000. She will use it to purchase more materials for stitching, like spools of thread, packs of buttons and laces. With these purchases, she will be able to satisfy the increasing demand of her customers. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. Shabana hopes to grow her business and dreams of giving a good and quality education to her children, through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to purchase more spools of thread, packs of buttons and lace, etc.

loans.name: Shabana

texts.en:
Mrs Shabana is a 46-year-old, married woman, and a mother of two children. She is in the business of making costume jewelry, and she has been doing this for many years. The business has great potential for growth, and Shabana is actively doing this business as it is the only source of income for them.

In order to meet the orders on time and boost her sales, Shabana requested a loan of 35,000 PKR. She will use it to purchase raw materials for jewelry, such as silver, gold, and dozens of artificial gems and pearls. She hopes to get an increase in her net income, and she intends to use that to provide good and quality education to her children.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials for jewelry-making, such as silver, gold, and dozens of artificial gems and pearls.

loans.name: Shazia

texts.en: Ms. Shazia works from home as a tailor; she has been in this line of work for two years now and is proud to be contributing to her household income. When Shazia was not earning, her family was going through a severe financial crisis that compelled her to use her stitching skills in a productive manner. She is a brave woman and hard work helped her establish a good clientele, but she was having difficulty in fulfilling large orders. Then she got knowledge regarding Kashf Foundation services from her neighbor. She has requested a loan of PKR 20,000 and her loan will be used to purchase a new stitching machine with some spool of threads in various colors. She is very thankful to Kashf for its tremendous support.

loans.use: to purchase a new stitching machine with some spool of threads in various colors.

loans.name: Nathalie

texts.en:
This loan will help Nathalie grow her clothing designer company.

At age 16, Nathalie began sewing for a designer in Paris. Years later, she began her own designer line Dolita Paris and has been passionately creating dresses ever since. When she moved to New York City seven years ago, Nathalie continued to follow her dream and set up Dolita in a small showroom in Manhattan. She has since created pieces for many celebrities including: Miss USA 2009, Miss Universe 2009, Halle Berry, Tyra Banks, and Beyonce.

Nathalie now needs a loan to expand her business and to open a pop-up shop on Lexington Avenue to gain more visibility.  

Visit Nathalie’s website and see her designs at: http://www.dolitaparis.com/

loans.use: To expand her business and open a pop-up showroom on Lexington Avenue.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a software program to formulate more efficient job estimates

loans.name: Shehnaz

texts.en:
Ms. Shehnaz has been operating a shoe making business for the past 15 years. For a year of her business she had low capital because of many problems in receiving payments on time, and was unable to expand her business activities. At that point in time, she was afraid of taking an informal loan from relatives, so she then contacted Kashf Foundation upon the suggestion of her neighbor. 

Shehnaz is an energetic person and eager to support her family. She is liable to fulfill the basic necessities of her children including food, health and education. She is also accountable to improve their standard of living. Her children help her in doing this business of shoe making.

It’s her fourth year with Kashf Foundation. By the support of Kashf Foundation Shehnaz is fulfilling her dreams and is able to manage her children’s education. Now, she has requested a loan of PKR 30000 to buy additional materials for shoes, including leather, artificial leather and plastic soles etc. In this way she can handle the growing demand for her shoes in the market and hence better support her family.

loans.use: to buy additional materials for shoes including leather, artificial leather and plastic soles etc.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.en:
This loan will help Carlos to purchase a garment printer to help expand his screen printing business. 

With an artistic background in oil, sculpture, airbrush tattoo, and digital art, Carlos wanted to turn his skills into a profitable business. Just a few years after Carlos moved to the U.S. from Ecuador, he began Hypnotic Art, a company that provides personalized screen printed products. 

Although Carlos just opened his business as of November 2012, his clientele is rapidly growing, and he is already serving a wide range of clients, including sports teams, artists, bars and restaurants, and small businesses looking for personalized clothing items.

Carlos now needs a loan to purchase a garment printing machine to increase his client orders and expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase a garment printing machine.

loans.name: Abdurahim

texts.ru:
Абдурахим молодой мужчина в возрасте 25 лет, женат и имеет детей.  Он живет со своими родителями. Абдурахим  занимается куплей продажей фруктов и овощей.   Он  торгует на центральном рынке мандаринами, яблоками, бананами и другими различными фруктами и овощами.  Наступает праздник "Навруз" и все люди будут покупать его товар, для этого он планирует увеличить свой ассортимент  товаров.  Кроме этого в торговле помогает его  мать, в  отсутствии Абдурахима его мать сидит за прилавком.
 Сам Абдурахим работает в сезонное время на стройке, он маляр но доход у него от продажи фруктов. Настоящий кредит он хочет потратить на покупку фруктов и овощей.
texts.en: Abdurahim is a young man, age 25.  He's married, has children, and he lives with his parents.  Abdurahim buys and resells fruits and vegetables.  He sells mandarins, apples, bananas, and other sorts of fruits and vegetables at a central market.  The Persian New Year is approaching and all will be buying his goods.  In preparation, Abdurahim wants to expand and improve his assortment of inventory.  His mother helps him and in his absence, she sits behind his counter.  Abdurahim also works seasonally in construction as a painter.  But his main income comes from sales.  He will use his loan to buy fruits and vegetables.

loans.use: to buy fruits

loans.name: Yasmeen

texts.en:
Ms Yasmeen, a vigorous 40-year-old married woman, has been selling clothes for the past three years. She buys apparel made of various fabrics in a variety of colors and designs from the market at wholesale rates and then sells them to the people of her community. She has a varied customer base and is able to earn enough through her business.

Yasmeen is requesting a 35,000 PKR loan from the Kashf Foundation to buy a wide variety of clothes in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her inventory. She expects a boost in her earnings as a result of her loan, and she plans to spend part of her profits on the betterment of her family.

loans.use: to buy a wide variety of clothes in different colors and designs to expand her inventory and attract more customers.

loans.name: Ayesha

texts.en: Ms Ayesha is a 27-year-old, vigorous lady; she has been stitching clothes for many years. She stitches for the people of her community and uses the income to support her entire family. However, due to a lack of available funds, she is unable to satisfy the daily demands of her customers. For this reason, she requested a loan of Rs 20,000 from Kashf Foundation. She intends to use this loan amount to buy more materials to use in stitching, like spools of thread in different colors, packs of lace, zippers and buttons. These purchases will allow her to increase sales and revenues, so she may able to generate a healthier income. She is thankful to Kashf for its tremendous support.

loans.use: to buy more spools of thread in different colors, with packs of lace, zippers, and buttons.

loans.name: Shahida

texts.en: Ms. Shahida is a 46-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a general store with her husband at the corner of her house. She has gained seven years of experience in this field. Her husband also assists her by purchasing stocks of goods from the market, as he has maintained many contacts there over the years. Shahida is a mother of four children and is motivated to provide her family with good quality food, clothing and health. She wants to grow her business so she requested a loan of PKR 35,000 to buy packs of salt, biscuits and beverages to meet with the increasing demand at her store. She is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy packs of salt, biscuits and beverages to meet with the increasing demand at her store.

loans.name: Jose

texts.en:
This loan will help Jose to purchase marketing supplies in order to gain more visibility for his business and to hire an employee. 

Jose began Dynamic Turbo in September 1994 to supply his community in Miami with high performance auto parts and accessories. His business has since grown and Jose now sells and distributes parts to businesses and individuals across the U.S. Jose also specializes in fabricating and installing suspension, brake and body styling products, and offers full tuning services.

Jose is now looking to expand his business and he needs a loan to purchase marketing and inventory supplies and to hire an employee. 

You can view Jose’s website at: http://www.dynamicturbo.com/

loans.use: To purchase marketing and inventory supplies and to hire an employee

loans.name: Vista Hermosa Group

texts.es:
La señora Ana  es unida de hecho, tiene 52 años de edad, no curso ni un año la escuela, tiene 7 hijos y ni uno de ellos estudia, ella se dedica a la agricultura, especialmente al cultivo de tomate, inició este negocio cuando se unió a su esposo y quiso ayudarlo economicamente; hasta la fecha lleva 32 años de experienci en duicho neogocio.

Organiza un grupo y solicita un préstamos que le servirá para la compra de abono o fertilizante para la producción de tomate. Ella en el futuro proximo quiere tener mejor producción de tomate y distribuirlos por mayor; las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a crianza de animales domésticos y a la agricultura.
texts.en:
Ana, 52, is married and has seven children, none of whom attend school.  She didn't attend even one year of school.  She earns a living in agriculture, especially growing tomatoes.  She started this business when she married her husband and wanted to help him financially.  At present she has 32 years of experience in this business.

She's organizing a group and requesting a loan to buy manure and fertilizer for her tomato crop.  In the near future she wants to have a better crop of tomatoes and distribute them wholesale.

The other members of the group make a living raising domestic animals and farming.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for tomatoes

loans.name: Khawla

texts.en:
Khawla is a 42-year-old, conservative, married woman; she asked that her husband would appear in the photo in her place.

Khawla is a mother of one baby daughter. While she is looking after her daughter, her husband works in selling fruits and vegetables in his shop. Now Khawla wants to support her husband, by increasing the quantity he has in the shop and bringing in more kinds of fruits. For that reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to buy more kinds of fruits, and increase the quantity of inventory her husband has available in his greengrocer shop.

loans.name: Baraa

texts.en: Baraa is a 21-year-old, single lady. She is the eldest in her family. Baraa attends a governmental university, to study about school and student guidance. She is applying for an educational loan to support her in her studies and help her pay for her next semester's fees.

loans.use: to pay for her next semester's fees.

loans.name: Balqees

texts.en:
Ms. Balqees is a 47-year-old married woman and a mother of one child. She decided to work with her husband to support her family for a better future. Two years ago she began stitching work in her house. She sews for the people living around her house and uses the income to support her entire family. She knows very well the techniques of stitching. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. 

Ms. Balqees earns enough to lead a decent life. However, due to lack of availability of funds she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 20,000. She intends to use this loan amount to buy raw material including cloth and threads of different colors with packs of zippers and button. These materials will create a means of increasing revenues so that she may be able to generate a healthier source of income.

loans.use: to buy raw material including cloth and threads of different colors with packs of zippers and buttons.

loans.name: Rosa Arcila

texts.es:
La Señora Rosa forma parte del banco comunal Las Toquilleras desde hace varios años,  le gustan los créditos ya que puede mejorar su pequeño negocio. Vive en el cantón Sigsig lugar que goza de una belleza natural ya que se encuentra rodeado de varias montañas y verdes campos, su arquitectura es una mezcla de lo antiguo con lo moderno, su gente es amable, gentil y de un gran corazón,  aun mantienen su cultura y tradiciones.

La Señora Rosa tiene 46 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 6 hijos, dos de ellos son casados y viven independientes, uno de sus hijos estudia en la universidad, uno está en el colegio y sus dos últimos hijos estudian en una escuelita de la localidad. Su esposo es chofer profesional y labora conduciendo un bus, la casa en la que viven es propia.

Doña Rosa se dedica a la cría de animales y también teje sombreros de paja toquilla actividad que la aprendió desde muy pequeña gracias. Estos negocios le han permitido aportar a la economía de su casa y solventar los gastos de los estudios a sus hijos.

Su crédito anterior lo invirtió en la compra de alimento para sus animales y taja toquilla, de los cuales obtuvo muy buenas ganancias. Esta repitiendo el crédito y lo va a  invertir en alimento para sus animales y libros pagar los estudios de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Rosa has been part of “Las Toquilleras” (The Straw Hat Makers) communal bank for several years. She likes the loans since she can improve her small business. She lives in Sigsig Canton, a place which enjoys natural beauty since it is surrounded by several mountains and green fields. It has a mixture of old and modern architecture. Its people are kind and courteous with big hearts. They still keep to their culture and traditions.

Rosa is 46 years old. She is married and from her marriage she has conceived six children. Two of them are married and have left home, one studies at university, one is at high school, and her two youngest children go to a small local school. Her husband is a professional driver; he drives a bus. The house they live in is their own.

Rosa makes a living from breeding animals and she also weaves Panama hats, an activity which she learnt to do from a very young age. These businesses have allowed her to contribute to her household finances and meet the costs of her children’s studies.

She invested her previous loan in the purchase of animal feed and toquilla straw, from which she obtained very good profits. She is repeating the loan and is going to invest it in feed for her animals and books for her children’s studies.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and books.

loans.name: Arevik

texts.en:
Arevik is married and has four children. She keeps two cows and three calves, gets their milk, and uses it in cheese production. Her sons and husband help her to sell the cheese in a local market and earn income for family.

Realizing that this income helps the family because it is stable income, Arevik would like to expand her livestock herd. She has applied for this loan, which she will use to purchase a cow and a calf. This will help her to gather more milk and make more cheese, which will significantly increase her income and help her to ensure a better life for her children.

loans.use: to pay for a cow and a calf to add to her dairy herd

loans.name: Lendrush

texts.en:
Lendrush is from Miasnikyan village of Armavir region. He owns agricultural land where he cultivates tomato, watermelon and melon. Lendrush also keeps 20 chickens and sells eggs to local market traders. He works hard to gather a good harvest and sustain his family of five others: his parents, wife and two little sons.

Lendrush has applied for this loan to purchase three oxen, fertilizer and forage for feeding the livestock. The loan will help him to expand his agricultural activity and gather more income. This is very important in order for him to be able to cover the family's basic costs and ensure a better life for them.

loans.use: to pay for three oxen, fertilizer and forage for feeding the livestock

loans.name: Mayisik

texts.en:
Mayisik is from the Hartashen village of the Syunik region, which is famous for its severe cold climate. People there are mostly involved in cattle farming and some land cultivation. 

As a father of three children, Mayisik works hard to gather income and sustain his family. Mayisik breeds cattle. His livestock currently includes 12 cows, 10 calves, a pig and five chickens. He also cultivates wheat and sells the gathered harvest to locals.

As the sole financial income of the family comes from agriculture, Mayisik would like to expand his farm. He has applied for this loan to purchase two cows and forage for feeding the livestock. The loan is important for Mayisik to be able to expand his farm and gather more income, which will help him to improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to pay for two cows and forage for feeding the livestock

loans.name: Cornelia

texts.es: Cornelia tiene 38 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos, ella nació en la ciudad de Saylla y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació. Su actividad económica principal es la crianza de animales menores como cuyes  y gallinas, ella también se dedica a la agricultura pues siembra maíz, pasto y choclo. Ya son varios años que se dedica  al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su labor. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar alimento para cuyes.
texts.en:
Cornelia is 38 years old and lives in a common-law union that has produced 2 children. She was born in the city of Saylla and lives in the same city where she was born. Her principal economic activity is raising small animals such as guinea pigs and hens. Cornelia also farms, sowing corn, fodder, and maiz.

She has been in this business for various years and it is going very well, thanks to the labor and effort she puts into it. At present, she needs the loan to purchase food for the guinea pigs she raises.

loans.use: to buy guinea pig feed for the animals she raises.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to rebuild her capital through the purchase of various goods for resale (beauty products, shoes, soap etc), to continue to make a living.

loans.name: Ariunzul

texts.en:
Mrs. Ariunzul, 40 years old, lives with her husband and three children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in a Mongolian traditional ger (portable felt dwelling), on fenced land. She and her husband have been running a tire repair shop for seventeen consecutive years and accumulated a vast amount of experience.

She is requesting a loan of 3,000,000 MNT. She will use it to purchase equipment for tire repair, such as pumps, wheel removal tools, wrenches, and compressors, so that she can run her business without any shortage of necessary tools. The borrower is a very hardworking individual, who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to purchase equipment for the tire repair business

loans.name: Kalida

texts.en:
Ms. Kalida is a 34-year-old married woman and a mother of four children. She is a very talented lady and excels in her work of stitching. She has gotten a lot of appreciation from her community. She accepted the fact that if her husband works alone for their family, they will not be able to meet the expenses of their household or the educational needs of their children. 

Together with her husband, Kalida manages their household while operating a business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses. She has requested a loan of PKR. 20,000 to purchase more reels of thread and packs of buttons, zippers and laces in various colors. In this way, she will be able to meet the increasing demand consistently. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. 

Kalida hopes to grow her business and dreams of giving a good and quality education to her children through all her hard work.

loans.use: to purchase more reels of thread and packs of buttons, zippers and laces in various colors.

loans.name: Nazeer

texts.en:
Ms Nazeer, a 46-year-old married mother of four, has been weaving sweaters for many years. She works hard everyday to earn a living for her family and provide food, health, and education.

Nazeer is requesting her sixth loan from Kashf Foundation for Rs. 50,000 to purchase bundles of wool and threads in a variety of colors in order to increase her sales. She has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf Foundation and is thankful for its support.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wool and threads in a variety of colors.

loans.name: Julian

texts.es:
