Julian tiene 39 años de edad es casado tiene 5 hijos, vive con la esposa y con los hijos en  Guaranda provincia de Bolívar.

Es integrante de la Vrc Nuevos Horizontes, la comunidad se encuentra a unos 40 minutos en la comunidad Santa Martha perteneciente al Cantón Guaranda.

Julian se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de mora y naranjilla y a la cría de pollos y cerdos.

Solicita el crédito para comprar los abonos orgánicos, urea,  y fertilizantes, insecticidas para mejorar la producción. Las compras y las ventas los hace en Guaranda.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los fertilizantes. El sueño aumentar los cultivos y engagrandecer el negocio.
En el tiempo libre le gusta salir a la fiesta con la familia.
texts.en:
Julian, 39, is married and has five children.  He lives with his wife and the children in Guaranda, in the province of Bolívar.  He's a member of Nuevos Horizontes Communal Bank, located some 40 minutes away in the Santa Martha community of Guaranda Canton.

Julian makes a living in agriculture growing blackberries and naranjillas and raising chickens and pigs.  He makes his purchases and sales in Guaranda.

He's requesting the loan to buy organic manure, urea, fertilizer, and insecticide to improve production.  The loan will help him be able to buy the fertilizer.  His dream is to increase his crops and expand his business.

In his free time he likes to go to parties with his family.

loans.use: to buy organic manure, urea, fertilizer, and insecticide

loans.name: Maricruz

texts.es: Maricruz tiene 25 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo, ella nació en la ciudad de Saylla y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació. Su actividad económica principal es la venta de madera y materiales de construcción (Arena, ladrillos, piedra chancada y otras cosas mas). Ya son varios años que se dedica  al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su labor. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar ladrillos.
texts.en:
Maricruz, age 25, is in a common-law marriage and has a child.  She was born in the city of Saylla, and she lives in the same city where she was born.

Her main business activity is selling wood and construction materials (sand, bricks, gravel, and other things).  She has been in this business for several years.  It is going very well for her, thanks to the effort that she puts into her work.

At this time she needs the loan to buy bricks.

loans.use: to buy bricks.

loans.name: Armine

texts.en:
Armine is a 30-year-old mother of three children. She has been involved in agriculture for 10 years. Together with her husband, Armine keeps livestock, which currently includes 15 cows, 10 lambs, and 15 chickens. They also own a piece of agricultural land, where they cultivate wheat, and they sell the gathered harvest in the local markets. Armine gathers milk and uses it in cheese production, and her husband takes it to market and sells it.

The farming business is the only source of income for the family, so Armine would like to expand their farm. She has applied for this loan, which she will use to purchase three more cows, and forage for feeding them. This loan will help Armine and her husband to get more milk and milk products, and earn more income. That income is very important, to enable Armine and her husband to cover their family's costs and to ensure a better life for their children.

loans.use: to pay for three cows and forage for feeding them

loans.name: Robina

texts.en:
Mrs Robina is a 34-year-old, married woman, and a mother of six.  She is a hardworking mother, who is helping her family by providing services of tailoring in her community. She has been doing this work for the past six years. She knows the techniques of stitching very well. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns enough to lead a decent life.

To help her continue the operation of her business, she requested a loan of Rs. 30,000. She will use it to buy a stock of thread in different colors and packs of zippers, buttons, etc. The increased stock will permit her to satisfy the increasing demand. In addition to repaying the loan, she will use part of the revenues to deal with personal expenses.

loans.use: to buy a stock of thread in different colors and packs of zippers, buttons, etc.

loans.name: Naseem

texts.en:
Ms Naseem, a 39-year-old mother of seven children, is trying hard to meet their needs, which include food, health, clothing, and education. She has been sewing gloves for many years, stitching for the people of her community to support her entire family. Happy to work for the sake of her family, Naseem is respected in her home.

Because she lacks the funds, Naseem is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. For this reason she contacted Kashf Foundation and is requesting her second loan for Rs. 20,000 to buy another new machine and spools of threads in various colors. With a good repayment history, this will be her second loan.

loans.use: to buy another new machine and spools of threads in various colors.

loans.name: Maa Mangala Self Help Group

texts.en:
In 1998, nine women from Khalibandha village stepped out and decided to build a secure future for their families. They formed a group named Maa Mangala Self Help Group. The members of Maa Mangala Self Help Group are all women from a district of Dhenkanal in Odisha, India. 

One of them is Mrs. Sanjukta, who was selected as their president. The lady wearing a dark blue saree sitting in the middle of the front row is Sanjukta. Sanjukta is 35 years old and is staying with her husband and her only child. Her husband is a farmer and has been involved in the activity of cultivation for a long time. 

Sanjukta got the idea of doing vegetable cultivation from her husband. She wanted to support her husband financially, so she started growing vegetables a few years back. This helped her in managing her household necessities. Initially, she started with growing only a few vegetables like potatoes, tomatoes and onions, but later on she grew bitter gourds, snake gourds, cucumbers, lady fingers and brinjal (eggplant). 

She has very good relationship with her customers, as she sells fresh vegetables to them. Now she has a new idea to purchase some more land for cultivation, so that she can grow more vegetables at a large scale, for which she has requested a loan to purchase small plants, seeds, pesticides and fertilizers.

Sanjukta, along with her group, Maa Mangala Self Help Group, has requested a loan of 270,000 INR for enhancing their businesses.

loans.use: to purchase small plants, seeds, pesticides and fertilizers for her vegetable growing business.

loans.name: Rufina

texts.es: Rufina tiene 34 años de edad y es casada de la cual tiene dos hijos, ella nació en la ciudad de Chumbivilca pero vive en la ciudad de Saylla. Su actividad económica principal es la venta de comida. Ya son varios años que se dedica  al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su labor. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para insumos como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar, carne, verduras, fideos, aceite y otras cosas más.
texts.en:
Rufina, 34, is married and has two children.  She was born in the city of Chumbivilca but lives in the city of Saylla.

Her main economic activity is selling food.  She has been working in this business for several years now and it's going very well for her thanks to the effort she puts into her work.

She needs this loan for supplies such as rice, sugar, meat, vegetables, noodles, oil, and other things.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, meat, vegetables, noodles, oil, and other supplies

loans.name: Rubina

texts.en:
Ms Rubina is a 48-year-old, married woman. She has been successfully running a business of flower-making, for the past one year. She offers various colorful flowers, for decorating homes and for events like birthdays, parties, etcetera. She sells the flowers to the people of her community and also supplies them in the local market. She has good communication skills and has a good client list. Her husband works as a laborer and earns insufficient income to support their family, alone. She is motivated to provide for her family.

Rubina wants to grow her business, so she requested a loan of Rs. 25,000. She will use it to buy raw materials, such as fabric, glace papers, and packs of paint in various colors. In this way, she will be able to meet the increasing demands of her customers, consistently. She wishes to use part of the revenues to deal with the expenses of her family, and part to increase her business capital.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for flower-making, such as fabric, glace papers, and packs of paint in various colors

loans.name: Shakti Shree Purusotam Self Help Group

texts.en:
The responsible Shakti Dhree Purusotam Self Help Group is made up of eight members. The members of the group are all women from the district of Dhenkanal in Odisha, India. All the group members are involved in doing different kind of activities. 

One of them is Ms. Santilata, who was selected as their president. The lady wearing a yellow saree, sitting first from the left hand side is Santilata. 

Santilata is 53 years old and lives with her husband and a child. She is engaged in the activity of making plates, bowls, spoons and other utensils made of brass, and then sells them in the nearby market. These plates are used for different purposes, mainly for serving food, and sometimes are used while performing rituals. She makes different types and sizes of plates and bowls, depending upon the demand of her customers. 

Santilata has a plan to expand her business by producing greater quantities of her products, for which she needs machinery with which she can make the plates more frequently and quickly. She also needs raw materials like coal, brass, furnace, etc. She has a very good relationship with her customers because she completes their orders on time.

Santilata, along with her group, Shakti Shree Purusotam Self Help Group, has requested a loan of 240,000 INR for expanding their businesses.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials like coal, brass, furnace, etc. for her utensil-making business.

loans.name: Safia

texts.en:
Ms Safia is a 46-year-old, married woman. She and her husband have been successfully running a business, making sweets, in a shop near their house. She has 20 years of experience in this field.  Her husband also assists her by purchasing ingredients from the market, as he has built and maintained many contacts over the years.

Safia is a mother of two children and is motivated to provide her family with good-quality food, clothing and health care. She wants to grow her business, so she requested a loan of PKR 45,000, which she will use to buy packs of oil, sugar and ghee, with which to meet the increasing demand for sweets. She is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy ingredients, like oil, sugar and ghee, with which to make more sweets

loans.name: Sameena

texts.en:
Ms. Sameena is a 46-year-old married woman and a mother of two children. She has been running a beauty parlor in her community for the last five years. She has gradually improved her business and has become famous in her community for providing the best quality services of makeup, hair styling and facials.  

Sameena needs a loan of Rs 25,000 to buy hair care products, skin products and creams for bleaching and whitening in large quantities. With the help of this loan, she will be able to meet the increasing demands of her clients.  

Sameena has been in association with Kashf Foundation for two years and has shown excellent repayment behavior.

loans.use: to buy hair care products, skin products and creams for bleaching and whitening in large quantities.

loans.name: Kousar

texts.en:
Ms Kousar is 43 years old and works from home, as a tailor. She has been in this line of work for twelve years and is proud to be contributing to her household's income. When Kousar was not earning her family was going through a severe financial crisis, which compelled her to use her stitching skills in a productive manner. Her husband was the sole bread winner of the family, and due to limited resources, none of their sons were sent to school. Kousar felt it obligatory to change her family’s living standard and started working from home.

Kousar is a brave woman, and hard work helped her establish a good clientele, but she was having difficulty in fulfilling large orders. That’s when her sister advised her to borrow from Kashf. She has requested to borrow Rs. 35,000, which she will use to purchase a new stitching machine, with spools of thread and zippers in various colors.

loans.use: to purchase a new stitching machine, with spools of thread and zippers in various colors.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es: Margarita tiene 63 años de edad y es casada de la cual tiene siete hijos, ella nació en la ciudad de Urubamba pero vive en la ciudad de Saylla. Su actividad económica principal es la venta de fruta y verduras. Ya son varios años que se dedica  al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su labor. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar frutas como por ejemplo paltas, piñas, granadillas, naranjas, papayas y otras cosas más.
texts.en:
Margarita, 63, is married and has seven children.  She was born in the city of Urubamba but lives in the city of Saylla.

Her main economic activity is selling fruits and vegetables.  She has been in this business for several years now and it's going very well for her because of the effort she puts into her work.

She needs this loan to buy avocados, pineapples, passion fruit, oranges, papaya, and other fruits.

loans.use: to buy avocados, pineapples, passion fruit, oranges, papaya, and other fruits

loans.name: Daysi Del Carmen

texts.es:
Daysi, una humilde comerciante, de 32 años de edad, originaria de las Comarca las Canoas, Teustepe, soltera, madre de 2 hijos de 10 y 14 años de edad, de oficio comerciante, es dueña de una pulpería de la que es propietaria hace mas de 5 años, actualmente sus dos hijos  están estudiando. 
Inicio en el ámbito del comercio, con capital propio, dinero que tenia ahorrado, de la compra y venta de granos básicos, negocio que le genera  muchas ganancias a diario, luego decidió convertirlo en una  pulpería, para que le genere mas ingresos extras, cuenta con el apoyo de sus hijos, sus expectativas es seguir ampliando y reforzando su negocio con productos nuevos para satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes.
Esta requiriendo el financiamiento para comprar azúcar, arroz, frijoles, aceite, etc. Ella estima que este crédito le ayudara a surtir su negocio con productos que aun no tiene en existencias.
texts.en:
Daysi, 32, is a humble merchant who's from the Las Canoas region of Teustepe.  She's single and the mother of two children, ages 10 and 14, who currently attend school.  She has owned a grocery store for more than five years.

She started as a merchant with her own capital, her savings from buying and selling basic grains, a business that generated a lot of daily profits for her.  Then she decided to convert it into a grocery store to earn extra income.  She has the help of her children.  She hopes to continue expanding and strengthening her business with new products to satisfy her customers' needs.

She needs the loan to buy sugar, rice, beans, oil, etc.  She thinks this loan will help her stock her business with products she doesn't have yet.

loans.use: to buy sugar, rice, beans, oil, etc.

loans.name: Shazia

texts.en: Ms. Shazia is a 29-year-old married woman who has been selling milk with her husband for the past 3 years.  They have two cows and one buffalo and sell milk to many of their neighbors.  Shazia looks after the cows and buffaloes and performs the task of collecting milk.  Her husband sells it to different places on a daily basis.  They feel pleasure while doing this business to secure their children’s future.  They have five daughters, four of whom are in school.  They need to earn much more to meet their everyday expenditures, including food, clothing, and education.  In order to make more profit, Shazia requested a loan of 25,000 PKR to purchase another buffalo to milk.  This will increase their production capacity which will help them to generate more revenue.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo.

loans.name: Musarrat

texts.en:
Ms. Musarrat has been making shoes for the last six years.  During the year she has experienced low capital because of many problems receiving timely payments.  As a result, she was unable to expand her business activities.  Since she was afraid to take informal loan from relatives, she contacted Kashf foundation upon the suggestion of her neighbor.  She is an energetic person and eager to support her family.  As a widow and a mother of six children, she is responsible for fulfilling the basic necessities (food, health, and education) and improving their standard of living. 
Her children help her to make shoes.  With this support of Kashf Foundation (her 5th loan) she is fulfilling her dreams and is able to manage her children’s education.  Her loan request of 40,000 PKR will be used to buy additional shoe materials (leather, plastic soles, etc).  In this way she can handle the growing demand of her shoes in the market and, as a result, better support her family.

loans.use: to buy materials to make shoes.

loans.name: Zainab

texts.en:
Ms. Zainab is a 42-year-old married woman with 3 children.  Her husband is a driver.  She has been running a business selling cloths for many years.  She purchases a variety of cloths from the main city and then sells it to the people in her vicinity.  She has become well known for selling good quality cloths in her community.  

Zainab requested a loan of 20,000 PKR from Kashf Foundation to buy a stock of different cloths.  They will be of the summer season to accommodate the choice and tastes of her customers.  In this way, she would be able to offer a great collection to the people of her community.  She hopes to have a good experience with this new loan and wants to grow her business.  She dreams of providing a quality education to her children through her business efforts.

loans.use: to buy cloths for the summer season.

loans.name: Perveen

texts.en: Ms. Perveen is a 37-year-old married woman.  She has been running a food stall and selling juice with the support of her husband (pictured here).  They have been doing this business for many years and they make enough money to run their household.  She is a mother of two children and is eager to provide them a better standard of living.  In order to improve her business, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a 20,000 PKR loan.  This will be used to purchase another juicer machine with the packs of sugar and flavors.  It would help her to cater to more customers.  She dreams of expanding her business and desires to use part of the profits on her children’s education.

loans.use: to purchase another juicer machine with sugar and flavors.

loans.name: Sofya

texts.en:
Sofya is from Karnut village and is involved in agriculture. She keeps 6 cows and 40 chickens and she cultivates potato and cabbage. Together with her husband Artyom, Sofya sells the gathered harvest at the local markets and gets money, which helps her to cover her family's daily costs.

She has applied for this loan to purchase two calves and seeds for cultivation. The loan is important for Sofya to expand her farming business and gather more income.

Sofya lives with her husband, mother-in-law and two children and does her best to ensure a better life for them.

loans.use: to pay for two calves and seeds for cultivation

loans.name: Aida

texts.en:
Aida has been involved in agriculture for 10 years.  She runs a farm which currently includes 4 cows, 30 chickens, wheat, barley, and potatos.  Aida also owns agricultural land where apricot, cherry, plum, nut, apple, and pear trees are grown. 

Aida is a very hardworking lady who does her best to gather a good harvest and earn income.  Since the sole family income comes from running the farm, Aida would like to expand it.

She has applied for this loan to purchase fuel for transportation, fertilizer, and potato seeds.  This is very important for Aida to cover fuel costs and to take the gathered harvest to market for sale.  The other part of the loan will be used for purchasing fertilizer and potato seeds for cultivation.  The loan is very important for Aida to be able to expand her farming business, earn income, and ensure a better life for her family.

Aida lives with her husband and two children in Shirak village.

loans.use: to pay for fuel for transportation, fertilizer, and potato seeds.

loans.name: Mahmoud

texts.en: Mahmoud is a 26-year-old single young man. He lives in a small village with his family and works as an accountant at a local company where he earns a small salary that is not enough to cover all his needs. Mahmoud also is a university student who wants to complete his Masters studies, so he is requesting a USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the cost of the university fees. This will ensure a better future for Mahmoud and improve the family's living conditions. Mahmoud is shown in the picture.

loans.use: To pay his university fees

loans.name: Aysha

texts.en:
Aysha is 35 years old and a mother with one son and three daughters. Her husband is employed and earns a low salary, which is not enough to cover the family's needs. For the past two years, Aysha has also been raising and selling cows and cow products, which has been a profitable project. But she needs more support to cover the family's needs.

Aysha is requesting a 1,000 USD loan from FATEN to help her cover the cost of purchasing more fodder to feed the cows she is raising. This will increase sales and improve the family's income. 

Aysha is photographed in front of the herd where she is raising the cows.

loans.use: To buy fodder to feed the cows

loans.name: Yevgen

texts.en:
Yevgen is from Drogobych, in Western Ukraine.  He sells at the Malyi market and has a small dishware store. 

Yevgen has invested his previous Kiva loan in the purchase of saucepans, frying pans, buckets, dishware sets and so on.  This time, Yevgen requests a 5,000 UAH loan in order to buy additional inventory, specifically buckets, shovels, and brooms. Yevgen tries to maintain a wide assortment of goods in order to attract customers.

loans.use: to buy new inventory such as buckets, shovels, and brooms.

loans.name: Abdullah

texts.en:
Abdullah is a 37-year-old married man and a father to one son and one daughter. His wife is a schoolteacher who gets a low salary, which is not enough to cover all the family's needs.

Abdullah lives with his family in a small village. There, where he lives, he has a cafe. He provides to his customers hot drinks such as tea and coffee in addition to quick meals such as sandwiches. His cafe is located in a good customer movement area where he has a lot of loyal customers. Abdullah is looking in the future to expand his cafe to become a restaurant to increase the family's income positively. 

Abdullah is requesting a USD loan from FATEN to cover the cost of purchasing necessary items such as sugar, tea and bread and installing additional shelves. This will allow Abdullah to continue serving his customers and satisfy their needs, which will improve his income positively.

Abdullah is photographed in his cafe.

loans.use: To purchase more tea, coffee and sugar and install additional shelves

loans.name: Clemente Antonio

texts.es:
Clemente, es originario de la comarca San Antonio  en las afueras de Estelí, padre de 2 hijos de 20 y 22 añ0s de edad, su esposa trabaja como profesora de una escuela primaria.  El inicio su actividad de siembra de café hace 5 años, ya que anteriormente se dedicaba a la siembra de granos de maíz y frijol. Pero al darse cuenta que las tierras son aptas para la caficultura decidió establecer una manzana con un poco de dinero que obtuvo de la venta de maíz y frijol. Es así que inicia en este rubro y poco a poco ha venido ampliando su área de cultivo. Las tierras con las que cuenta fueron  son propias, le  gustaría comercializar su producto a otros compradores de café que le paguen a un mejor precio el producto.
Las expectativas que tiene de su negocio son seguir ampliando el área de siembra, mejorar los rendimientos de producción.
El préstamo lo solicito para la compra de fertilizantes, plaguicidas y pago mano de obra para el mantenimiento de 4 manzanas de café en producción. El espera que este crédito le ayude a mejorar  los rendimientos en sus cosechas, obtener mayores ingresos para mejores condiciones económicas de su familia y la comunidad ya que también le daría fuente de empleo a los pobladores de su comunidad. Sus planes futuros son mejorar su vivienda, su finca y compra de materiales y equipos. Sus metas próximas son incrementar los rendimientos en el ciclo agrícola que está por comenzar.
texts.en:
Clemente is a native of the district of San Antonio, on the outskirts of Estelí. He is the father of two children, ages 20 and 22. His wife works as a teacher in a primary school. He began his business of planting coffee five years ago, since before that he planted corn and beans. But on noticing that the lands were suitable for growing coffee, he decided to establish an area of about 1.75 acres with a little money that he obtained from the sale of corn and beans. That is how he began this business, and little by little he has expanded his area of cultivation. The lands that he uses are his own. He would like to sell his product to other buyers of coffee who would pay him a better price for the product.

The expectations that he has from his business are to continue expanding the planting area and improving the production.

He is applying for the loan to buy fertilizers and pesticides and pay for labor to maintain about 7 acres of coffee in production. He expects that this loan will help him improve the yield of his harvests and obtain better income to improve the economic conditions of his family and the community, since he would also provide a source of employment to the people of his community. His future plans are to improve his house and his farm and buy materials and tools. His next goals are to increase his production in the agricultural cycle that is about to begin.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides and pay for labor to maintain seven acres of coffee in production

loans.name: Mahier

texts.en:
Mahier is a 31-year-old married woman.  Her husband is employed but his salary is not enough to cover all of their needs.

For the past three years, Mahier has had a beauty salon located in a distinguished commercial center.  She has many loyal clients and a good reputation.  Although this provides supplemental income, the family needs additional support to cover some necessary costs.

Mahier is requesting a 1,500 USD loan from FATEN to cover the cost of purchasing a new beauty kit for her salon.  This includes different types of hairbrushes, hair dryers, and a collection of hair and body creams.

Taking this loan will improve her business, increase her income, and improve their living conditions. Mahier is photographed inside her beauty salon.

loans.use: to purchase new beauty salon kit.

loans.name: Domingo

texts.es: Domingo tiene 66 años de edad y es casado y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene ocho hijos, él nació en la ciudad de Saylla y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació. Su actividad económica principal es la venta de fruta y verduras. Ya son varios años que se dedica  al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su labor. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar frutas como por ejemplo paltas, piña, granadillas, naranjas, papayas y otras cosas más.
texts.en: Domingo is 66 years old, married, and his beautiful marriage has produced eight children.  He was born in the city of Saylla and continues to live there.  He sells fruit and vegetables as his principal way of earning an income.  He has spent many years in this business, and he does very well thanks to his determination.  Domingo is asking for this loan to buy fruit such as avacados, pineapples, passion fruit, oranges, papayas, and other things.

loans.use: to buy fruits such as avacados, pineapples, passion fruit, oranges, papayas, and others.

loans.name: Believe In God Group

texts.en:
Umarr is the featured leader of this group of entrepreneurs. Umarr was born in Lungi, a town in northern Sierra Leone, 39 years ago. He is married to a businesswoman, and the couple has two children who are attending primary school. Umarr sells bed sheets and other house-decorating fabrics. He has been a businessman for three years.

With the help of this loan, Umarr and his group members will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales, and consequently improve their living conditions. Umarr will use his share of the loan (SLL 800,000) to buy a large quantity of fabric items, to add to his current stock.

loans.use: to buy home-decorating fabrics in large quantity, to add to his current stock

loans.name: Manal

texts.en:
Manal is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband, Maher, appears in her Kiva profile photo, instead.

Manal is a 40-year-old, married woman and a mother to one son and two daughters. Her children's ages are between 2 and 9 years old. Manal sews clothes for her customers, and her husband is a laborer, but both of them are getting low incomes that are not enough to cover all their family's needs.

Manal and her family live in their small and old house, which needs repair and improvement to its condition. Manal is requesting a USD loan from FATEN to help her cover the cost of repairing and improving the family's house, such as painting and installing new windows. Taking this loan will allow Manal and her family to have comfortable and suitable home conditions, so they can enjoy living in their house.

loans.use: To repair her family's home and improve its condition

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay his university fees

loans.name: Mujeres Hacia El Progreso 2, 3, 4 & 5 Group

texts.en:
Patricia is one of the members of the Grupo Mujeres Hacia el Progreso 2, 3, 4 & 5 made up of 20 micro business owners. They all work selling clothes, natural products, shoes, food, etc. Patricia is very excited to be receiving her sixth loan from Esperanza Internacional, after having paid off her previous loan satisfactorily and taken a step towards business growth. She has had her business selling clothes for around four years. She started the business with her own resources.

Patricia is planning to invest her new loan towards purchasing clothes, underwear and swimwear. She is going to use her earnings to continue saving. With previous loans, she started increasing her sales and saving. She is dreaming of having an improved business, to get married and to have her children. She tells us that her most difficult challenge was to establish her business and to finish studying. She loves to watch television and to help at the church.

loans.use: To buy clothes to sell

loans.name: Joy Ii Group

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT) is pleased to present the members of the “Joy II” group from Makeni. They are small-scale businesspeople who are based in Koidu, a city in eastern Sierra Leone.  They are requesting a loan of 800,000 SLL each in order to expand their respective businesses.  Consequently, they will make more profit and improve their standard of living. 

The leader of this group is Musa.  Musa is 34 years old and was born in Kenema city.  He is single with 3 children, 2 in primary school and 1 in secondary school.  Musa sells ready-to-wears (clothes) and has been running this business for 7 years now.  He will use his share of the loan to buy a large quantity of clothes to add to his business.

Also included on the left of the photo is loan officer, Edward.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of clothes for his business.

loans.name: Quiedondoya Group

texts.en:
This is the “Quiedondoya” group from Koidu, a city in eastern Sierra Leone.  They are all local entrepreneurs who are requesting a loan of 700,000 SLL each.  With the help of this loan they will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales, and improve their living conditions. 

Kadiatu is the featured group leader.  She is 39-year-old, married to a farmer, and has 3 children. Kadiatu has been a businesswoman for 15 years, selling food in the market.  This includes rice, palm-oil (the country’s most popular cooking oil), margi (used to give sauce a sweet taste), pepper, flour, and sugar.  With her share of this loan, Kadiatu will buy more of these items at wholesale prices.

loans.use: to buy food items for sale in the market.

loans.name: Hope To God Group-I

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva.org in Makeni, northern Sierra Leone, is very pleased to present to you the members of the Hope to God Group-I. These are small-scale entrepreneurs, who have come to SMT/Kiva lenders to seek a loan of SLL 2,700,000, for the entire group. Each of them will use a share of the loan to invest in her respective business. 

Bintu is the featured leader of this group. Bintu is a 42-year-old, married woman who has five children – three in primary school and two in secondary school. Bintu sells food ingredients at a market – for example, palm oil (the country’s most popular cooking oil), onions, magi (used to give sauces a sweet taste), pepper, sugar, and flour. She has been doing this business for 10 years. With the help of this loan, Bintu will invest in her business by buying the above-mentioned items in bulk, to add to her current stock.

loans.use: to buy food ingredients, in bulk, to add to her stock – for example, palm oil, onions, magi (used to give sauces a sweet taste), pepper, sugar, and flour

loans.name: Esperanza Divina Group

texts.en:
Bartola is a member of the group Esperanza Divina (Divine hope). This group, like many others, runs its businesses by walking through the community and selling from home. Most of them are selling clothes, shoes and jewelry, while others run beauty salons, grocery stores, etc. 

Bartola makes her home in a simple structure with her long-term partner and their four children. They live in the rural area surrounding Hato Mayor, an agricultural area. Bartola operates a fried food stall business. She has been in business for over five years, starting with some savings she had. While she says that her most important challenge is developing her business into a Comedor (a little restaurant), she continues to enjoy it. She is excited to be taking her third loan with Esperanza. She plans to use her loan to buy food ingredients like chicken, beef, flour, plantains, and other goods.

Bartola will use the profits to reinvest in her business. She is very happy for your support and she wants to thank you in her group’s name and her own!

loans.use: To buy flour, plantains, meat, etc.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es: Yolanda tiene 54 años de edad y es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene seis hijos, ella nació en la ciudad de Saylla y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació. Su actividad económica principal es la crianza de animales menores como pollos y cuyes. Ella también tiene un  pequeño restaurante donde expende uno de los más ricos platos típicos de la región que lo denomina “chicharon”. Ya son varios años que se dedica  al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su labor. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo carne de chancho, papas, cebollas, maíz, verduras y otras cosas más.
texts.en: Yolanda is 54 years old. She is married, and from this beautiful relationship she has six children. She was born in the city of Saylla, and she lives in the same city where she was born. Her principal business activity is raising small animals such as chickens and guinea pigs. She also has a small restaurant where she sells one of the most delicious dishes typical of the region, which is called "chicharon" (a fried meat dish). She has already worked in this business for a number of years, and it is going very well for her thanks to the effort that she puts into her work. At this time she needs the loan to buy ingredients such as pork, potatoes, onions, corn, vegetables, and other additional items.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as pork, potatoes, onions, corn, vegetables, and additional items.

loans.name: Fahfiddin

texts.ru:
Фахриддин молодой мужчина в возрасте 37 лет, он женат и имеет детей.  Его жена домохозяйка  дети еще очень малы.   Фахриддин является плотником.  Он занимается этим ремеслом в течении 15 лет,  но основная его работа , это откорм скота.  Этот вид деятельности дает очень хороший доход.  Фахриддин старается развивать этот бизнес. 
Он  мечтает купить машину, так как ему трудно и дорого каждый раз заказывать машину для перевозки скота и бревен, и с этой целю  он обратился в Арванд.   Он очень надеется на помощь от Арванд,  купив машину ему будет удобно развозить скот и заказы для своей работы.
texts.en:
Fahfiddin, aged 37, is married and has a family.  His wife is a homemaker and his children are still very young.  

Fahfiddin happens to be a carpenter and he has been working in this field for 15 years.  However, his main occupation is animal fattening, an activity which brings good revenues.  Fahfiddin is currently trying to expand this animal fattening business.

His dream is to buy a car.  Indeed, each time he has to transport livestock and timber, he needs to order a car, which is difficult and expensive.  This is why he has turned to MDO Arvand, and really hopes to receive help from this organization.  Buying a car would make it easier for him to transport livestock and to fulfill the orders he receives as a carpenter.

loans.use: to buy a car.

loans.name: Dilafruz

texts.ru:
Дилафруз получает кредит для развития своего бизнеса. Она домохозяйка и работы для ее возраста найти очень трудно. Дети все выросли и  она хочет дать им хорошее образование, ее муж уехал на заработки в Российскую Федерацию, поэтому Дилафруз хочет сама найти пути выживания и помочь своим детям.
  Она содержит дома несколько овец и корову и от них она имеет небольшой доход.   Раньше она занималась только откормом коров но для этого требовалось много времени и труда, крупно рогатый скот  долго  выдерживается  для продажи, поэтому она занялась также откормом овец чтобы быстрее получать хоть какой то доход, также она продает шерсть овец.  Дилафруз  копит на обучение сыновей, очень благодарна, что ее мечта превратиться в реальность с поддержкой Арванд.
texts.en:
Dilafruz is receiving a loan for business development. She is a housewife; because of her age it is very hard to find work. Her children are all grown and she would like to help them obtain a good education. Her husband left to work in Russia, so Dilafruz wants to find her own way to provide for herself and help her children. 

She raises several sheep and a cow at her house, which earns her a small income. Earlier she only raised cows but this takes a lot of time and work. Since cows take a long time to raise for sale, she also raises sheep, which earn her a profit sooner. She also sells wool. Dilafruz is saving for her sons' education. She is thankful that her dream is becoming reality with the support of Arvand.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Om-Ayhm Group

texts.en: Om-Ayhm is a four-member group. All of them are ladies from Sana`a, Yemen. They have asked for a 180,000 YER loan from AMB. Rania is a 26-year-old married woman with children. She is the leader of the group. She is a housewife and didn't complete her education. Most of the money she makes is spent on raising on her children. She intends to buy home appliances for her house. As these appliances are expensive, she asked for a youth loan of 50,000 YER. She hopes to complete her home renovation to feel safe in her house with her husband and children.

loans.use: to buy home appliances.

loans.name: Shuhrat

texts.ru:
Шухрат  молодой  мужчина в возрасте 25 лет. Он женат  и имеет  четверых детей .  Он занимается откормом крупно рогатого скота. Его семья поддерживает его  в бизнесе.  Старший сын Шухрата вместо пастуха выводит скот на пастбище. Недавно  Шухрат купил для сына коня , чтобы тот мог легко пасти их скот так как пешком идти в горы очень тяжело. 
 В настоящее время Шухрату необходимо закупить  много сена и различного корма, так как  вначале весны  его запас корма закончился, поэтому чтобы его скот не истощал он обратился в Арванд за кредитом. На полученный кредит Шухрат планирует купить корм для скота. Заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Shuhrat is a young, 25-year-old man. He is married and has four children. He raises cows. His family helps with the business. His oldest son rather than a shepherd, takes the animals to pasture. Recently Shuhrat bought a horse for his son so that he could shepherd more easily. Moving through the mountains on foot is very difficult. 

Right now Shuhrat needs to buy a lot of hay and extra feed since his stock of feed ran out in early spring. To keep his animals from going hungry he came to Arvand for a loan. Shuhrat plans to use the funds received to buy feed for the livestock. He thanks Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: to purchase livestock feed

loans.name: Kinthan Group

texts.en:
Kinthan Group has five tribal women members and all of them are hardworking. One of the group member is Machundailu; she is the featured borrower with her hand raised. Machundailu has been married for five years and has one daughter. Her husband is a cultivator. He cuts bamboo and firewood to sell at the market. Machundailu sells vegetables at the district main market. This is how she and her husband manage their family with a very small source of income.

Machundailu gets vegetables from cultivators and takes them to the district main market which is open three times a week. On the remaining days, she collects vegetables and keeps stock for the market days. She sells seasonal vegetables, but her main sales are green onions and chives. She sells green onions and chives because they grow all year round.

Machundailu says that her first loan helped her start the vegetable selling business. Machundailu says that the small profit left after repayment of the loan is not sufficient to start another business. She wants to raise piglets besides being a vegetable seller, because she feels that she can manage these two activities together efficiently. She will sell vegetables on market days and feed the pigs in the morning and evening. She will purchase piglets with this Kiva loan and raise them to sell when fully grown. She is pleased because she will be able to facilitate a piggery with the support of WSDS and Kiva.

The other group members are also engaged in selling vegetables. A vegetable selling business is the most common activity for them because it is the easiest and fastest way to make money.

Thank you WSDS and Kiva.

loans.use: To buy piglets to raise for sale

loans.name: Cris

texts.es: Cris tiene 28 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo, ella nació en la ciudad de Saylla y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació. Su actividad económica principal es la crianza de animales menores como gallinas y cuyes. Ya son varios años que se dedica  al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su labor. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para construir galpones para sus animales menores entonces va comprar calaminas, madera y otras cosas más.
texts.en: Cris is 28 years old and is in a free union relationship from which she has a son. She was born in the city of Saylla and lives in the same city where she was born. Her principal business is raising small animals such as chickens and guinea pigs. She has already worked in this business for a number of years, and it is going very well for her thanks to the effort that she puts into her work. At this time she needs the loan to build sheds for her small animals, so she is going to buy metal sheeting, wood, and other items.

loans.use: to buy metal sheeting, wood, and other items to build sheds for her small animals.

loans.name: Bahromali

texts.ru:
Бахромали мужчина в возрасте 55 лет. Он женат и имеет детей и внуков.  Бахромали  работает сторожем в одном из цеху. Но основная его работа это разведение скота, дома. Бахромали занимается всерьез скотоводством, каждые 4-5 месяцев он выводит скот на рынок продав по хорошей цене сразу же покупает пару молодых овец  или бычка для дальнейшего откармливания.  Также он стрижет овец  продает их шерсть. Его жена из шерсти делает клубочки шерстяных нитей, что позволяет продавать по дороже. Так старается поддерживать свой бизнес в балансе. 
 Сейчас он планирует купить еще   молоденьких овец, чтобы продать к праздникам по хорошей цене. Из полученной прибыли он копит на старость и на приданное своих внуков. Он очень надеется на поддержку от Арванд, чтобы осуществить свои планы.
texts.en:
Bahromali is a 55 year old man. He is married and has children and grandchildren. He works as a guard at a workshop. Most of the work he does is raising livestock, at home. Bahromali takes animal husbandry seriously. Every 4-5 months he takes animals to the market to sell at a good price, and at the same time buys a pair of lambs or a calf to raise. He also shears sheep and sells their wool. His wife spins the wool into thread, which allows him to sell it at a higher price. In these ways he tries to keep the business in a good financial position. 

Now he is planning to buy more lambs in order to sell them around the holidays for a high price. He will use the income earned to save for old age and for his grandchildren. He very much hopes that Arvand will aid him in fulfilling his plans.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Vera

texts.ru:
Вера замужем. Детей у нее нет. Она имеет собственный бизнес.
Вера продает женскую обувь на рынке на протяжении 20 лет. Она всегда выбирает качественный товар по доступным ценам. Вера вежливая, трудолюбивая и ответственная. Когда ее муж был болен, она самостоятельно содержала семью. 
Вера просит предоставить ей кредит в сумме 20000 гривен на закупку весенней коллекции обуви. Благодаря большому ассортименту, вера надеется увеличить доход, и тем самым улучшить быт семьи.
texts.en:
Vera is married.  She has no children.  She runs her own business.

Vera has been selling women's shoes at the market for the past 20 years.  She always chooses good quality merchandise at reasonable prices.  She is polite, hardworking and responsible.  When her husband was sick, she supported the family by herself.

Vera is requesting a loan of 20,000 hryvnia.  She will use this loan to buy an assortment of spring shoes.  Thanks to a larger selection of shoes, she hopes to increase her salary, and consequently improve her family's daily living conditions.

loans.use: to buy spring shoes.

loans.name: Fahriddin

texts.ru:
Фариддин мужчина в возрасте 25 лет женат имеет маленькую дочь.  Он занимается откормом скота. Фахриддин также работает в школе преподавателем. Так как на одну зарплату невозможно содержать семью и накопить денег для крупных расходов Фахриддин дополнительно дома содержит скот. Этим видом деятельности он занимается уже несколько лет. 
У него большие планы на будущее,он хочет обставить свой дом и приобрести необходимые вещи для хозяйства ,но пока у него не хватает  денежных средств. Для этого он копит деньги от доходов скотоводства. 
На полученный кредит Фахриддин планирует купить скот и откормив через некоторое время продаст за выгодную цену. Таким образом он расширит свой бизнес и накопив денег осуществит свои планы на будущее.
texts.en:
Fahriddin is a 25 year old man with a wife and a young daughter. He practices animal husbandry. Fahriddin also works as a school teacher. Since one salary cannot support a family and allow savings for large expenses, Fahriddin also keeps livestock at his house. He has been in this business for a few years already. 

He has big plans for the future: he would like to furnish his house and make needed purchases for his property, but he doesn't have enough money yet. He is using profits from the livestock business to save for those things. 

Fahriddin plans to use the loan to buy animals which he can sell at a profit after a period of feeding. This way he can expand his business and after saving money, make his plans for the future reality.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Ziragul

texts.ru: Зирагул жительница Яванского района, расположенный в центральной части Таджикистана. Ей 35 лет. Она замужем и мать двоих детей. Ее муж занимается съемкой свадеб и других торжественных мероприятий. Сама Зирагул работает в сфере торговли в течение 8 лет. Около дома у нее имеется собственный магазин, где она занимаетя продажей одежд, продуктов питания и хозяйственного товара. Сейчас Зирагул запрашивает кредит для приобретения сезонного товара (одежды и продуктов питания) в свой магазин. За счет прибыли Зирагул планирует сделать ремонт в своем новопостроенном доме.
texts.en:
Ziragul is a resident of the Yavan district, located in central Tajikistan.  She is 35 years old, married, and the mother of two children.  

While her husband works as a photographer, taking pictures at weddings and other special events, Ziragul has been working in retail for the past eight years.  She runs her own shop, close to where she lives, and she sells clothes, food products and household items.

She is currently requesting a loan to buy seasonal merchandise (clothes and food products) for her shop.  She plans to use her profits to perform some repairs in her newly-built house.

loans.use: to buy seasonal merchandise (clothes and food products) for her shop.

loans.name: Mahmudali

texts.ru:
Махмудали добрый и ответственный мужчина.  Он женат и имеет четверых детей.   Они живут в сельской местности. Жена домохозяйка занимается хозяйством и воспитанием детей. Махмудали занимается торговлей продуктами питания. Этим видом деятельности он занимается уже несколько лет. Это их единственный доход в семье. 
Махмудали хочет сделать подарок своей жене на день рождение,его жена очень долгое время мечтала иметь стиральную машину,поэтому он планирует обрадовать ее и купить стиральную машину. Но у него не достаточно денежных средств,поэтому он обратился в Арванд за кредитом. Надеется,что с помощью кредита Махмудали сможет осуществить желания своей жены.
texts.en:
Mahmudali is a kind and responsible person. He is married and has four children. They live in a rural area. His wife is a housewife; she takes care of the house and raises the children. Mahmudali is a grocer. He has been in the business for a few years already. It is the family's sole source of income. 

Mahmudali would like to give is wife a birthday present. She has always dreamed of having a washing machine, so he planned to buy one and make her happy. But he doesn't have enough money, so he has come to Arvand for a loan. Hopefully with the help of a loan Mahmudali will be able to make his wife's dream a reality.

loans.use: to buy a washing machine

loans.name: Las Comadres  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Las Comadres está formado por 11 mujeres quienes viven en la ciudad de Cuenca, es una ciudad del centro sur de la República del Ecuador y es la capital de la provincia del Azuay y de la Región 6. Está situada en la parte meridional de la Cordillera andina ecuatoriana. Las socias son personas muy trabajadoras que con su sacrificio en sus trabajos mejoran la estabilidad económica de sus hogares y el bienestar de sus familias. Aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos. 

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Flor, forma parte de la banca comunal desde hace 7 años,  tiene 60 años, es casada y  madre de 6 hijos, todos sus hijos son mayores de edad, 4 de ellos son casados viven independientes, sus dos hijos solteros trabajan  y le ayudan económicamente. Su esposo labora como empleado privado, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando. 

La Señora. Flor es una mujer luchadora, se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar y trabaja de domingo a domingo como comerciante ambulante, vende toda clase de bisutería, tiene este negocio 7 años y la va muy bien.

Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de bisutería para continuar con su negocio. 

Uno de sus sueños es tener una casa propia.

La foto pequeña es de una socia que no pudo estar presente cuando se tomo la foto del grupo.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank “Las Comadres” (The Godmothers) consists of 11 women who live in the city of Cuenca. This city is located in south-central Ecuador and is the capital of Azuay Province in Region 6. The city lies in the southern part of the Ecuadorian Andean mountain range. The members are hardworking individuals who have made sacrifices through their work so that they can improve the financial stability of their households and the welfare of their families. They have been able to maintain the culture and traditions of their people.

One of the group members is Sra. Flor. She joined the Communal Bank seven years ago. Flor is 60 years old, married, and the mother of six grown children. Four of them are married and live independently. The other two are single and work in order to help her financially. Her husband works as a private employee. They live in a rental property since they do not own a house.

Sra. Flor is a determined woman who spends time performing the household chores. She also works Sunday through Sunday as a traveling merchant. Flor sells all types of trinkets. She has been in business for seven years and is doing very well. Her new loan will be invested in the purchase of trinkets so that she can continue her business. One of her dreams is to have a house of her own.

The smaller photo is of a member who could not be present at the time the group photo was taken.

loans.use: to buy trinkets.

loans.name: Carmenza De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Doña  Carmenza una humilde agricultora, de 40 años de edad, originaria de  la Comarca San Lorenzo, soltera, madre de 8 hijos,  de sus 8 hijos solo 2 están estudiando y los otros trabajan. Carmenza, se dedica  a  la siembra de maíz y frijol, desde hace 25 años. Inicio su actividad agrícola desde muy joven, ayudando a sus padres en la siembra. La cual fue adquiriendo poco a poco experiencia y fue allí que decidió dedicarse a esta misma actividad.
Con mucho esfuerzo y arduo trabajo tiene sus  vacas, que ha ido comprando con las ganancias que le genera su cosecha, en todas las labores agrícola, paga mano de obra que le ayudan, su cosecha de maíz y frijol la vende allí mismo en la comunidad donde habita. Cuenta con el apoyo de toda su familia, recibe otros ingresos como es la venta de sus animales, sus expectativas es seguir luchando para salir adelante con su siembra.

Ella esta solicitando el financiamiento para comprar ternero de engordes. Con el objetivos de comprar mas animales para obtener mejores ganancias, dentro de sus planes futuro es poder comprar más tierra para ampliar el local en donde tiene sus animales y sus siembra.
texts.en:
Carmenza is 40 years old, a humble farmer from the San Lorenzo region. She is single, the mother of eight children, and of the eight children, only two are going to school and the others work. 

Carmenza has been growing corn and beans for 25 years. She started her farming at a young age, helping her parents with the sowing. Little by little she acquired experience, and that was how she decided to follow the same livelihood. 

Through much effort and hard work she has her cows, which she has been buying little by little with the earnings that her harvest generates. In all her farmwork she pays for laborers who help her. She sells her corn and bean harvest right there in the community where she lives. She has the support of her entire family and receives other income through the sale of her animals. Her hope is to continue striving to move forward with her farming. 

She is requesting a loan in order to buy fattening calves, with the aim of buying more animals to obtain better earnings. Her future plans include being able to buy more land so that she can expand the property where she has her animals and her crop.

loans.use: To buy calves for fattening

loans.name: Atilio

texts.es: Atilio tiene 42 años de edad y es separado de su pareja pero tiene dos hijos, él nació en la ciudad del Cusco pero actualmente vive en la ciudad de Urubamba. Su actividad económica principal es la venta de materiales de construcción. Ya son varios años que se dedica  al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su labor. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Reyna de los Angeles” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar arena, piedra chancada y otras cosas  más.
texts.en: Atilio, 42, is separated from his partner and has two children. He was born in the city of Cusco, and currently lives in the town of Urubamba. His main business activity is selling construction materials. He has several years experience in his business and is successful thanks to the effort he puts into his work. He belongs to the communal bank "Reyna de los Angeles" and he requires this loan to buy sand, crushed stone and other materials.

loans.use: to buy sand, crushed stone and other materials.

loans.name: Fausta Rosario

texts.es:
La Señora Fausta vive en La Libertad, ella tiene 64 años de edad. La clienta empezó vendiendo pollos, pero luego formo un grupo de mujeres que emprendían un proyecto de confección de ropa para una institución, y gracias a la ayuda del gobierno consiguieron maquinas de coser, y están encargada de confeccionar uniformes de escuelas y colegios.

Ella trabaja en el taller de sastrería y ventas de pollo  junto a su hija y trabajan hasta la madrugada. Los inconvenientes que se le presentan en su trabajo es la enfermedad ya que por ser muy dedicada a su trabajo descuida su salud y eso aveces afecta en su negocio.

Ella está casada pero su esposo ya es jubilado y el le ayuda en criar pollos, por ciertos meses del año para tener otros ingresos. 

Ella si tiene hijos pero son mayores de edad y todos están casados, ella vive sola con su esposo.
Con el préstamo ella va a comprar telas para la confección de camisas, pantalones, etc.  Ella desea para el futuro poder comprarse una bordadora.
texts.en:
Sra. Fausta is 64 years old and lives in La Libertad. She started out selling chickens, but she later formed a group of women who initiated a project of making school clothes. Thanks to assistance they received from the government, they were able to acquire sewing machines and began taking orders for school uniforms.

Fausta works in her tailoring shop, but she also sells chickens with her daughter in the early mornings. The obstacles she faces in her work include dealing with illness. Since she is very dedicated to her work, Fausta tends to neglect her health which sometimes affects the business. She is married, but her husband is retired and helps with raising chickens during certain months as a way of generating additional income.

Fausta has grown children and all of them are married. She and her husband live by themselves. With this loan, Fausta will buy fabrics for making shirts, trousers, and other items. In the future, she would like to buy an embroidery machine.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and thread.

loans.name: Gladys Teresa

texts.es:
La Señora. Gladys está realizando su segundo crédito a lado de sus amigas y compañeras del banco comunal María Reina de la Paz, la banca comunal le gusta por el compañerismo y la solidaridad de todas sus integrantes. Vive por la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad esta  bañada por 4 ríos y tiene varios lugares para disfrutar de la naturaleza, su gente conserva su cultura, tradiciones y su rica gastronomía.

La Señora Gladys tiene 42 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 19, 15 y 10 años de edad, su primera hija está estudiando en la universidad, su segundo hijo en el colegio y su última hija estudia en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo es de profesión Ingeniero en minería y labora en esta actividad, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.

Doña Gladys se dedica a los quehaceres de su casa y al cuidado de su familia, pero para ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos del hogar vende ropa por catálogo, tiene este negocio desde hace 16 años.

Su nuevo lo va a invertir en la compra de pantalones, blusas, camisetas y chaquetas.

Su meta es tener su propia boutique.
texts.en:
Sra. Gladys is taking out her second loan alongside her friends and fellow group members of the “María Reina de La Paz” (Mary, Queen of Peace) Communal Bank. She enjoys the camaraderie and the solidarity among all of the group members. Gladys lives in the city of Cuenca, which is surrounded by four rivers. There are several places where one can enjoy the natural beauty. The people have preserved their culture, their traditions, and their rich cuisine.

Sra. Gladys is 42 years old, married, and has three children (ages 19, 15, and 10). Her oldest daughter is studying at the university. The second child, a son, is in high school. Her youngest daughter attends an elementary school in the city. Her husband is an engineer by profession and works in the mining industry. They live in a rental property since they do not own a house.

Doña Gladys devotes herself to the household chores and looking after her family. In order to help her husband with the household expenses, she sells clothing through catalogs. She has been in business for 16 years. Her new loan will be invested in the purchase of trousers, blouses, T-shirts, and jackets. Gladys has a goal of opening her own boutique.

loans.use: to buy trousers, blouses, T-shirts, and jackets.

loans.name: Edid Margot

texts.es: Margot tiene 40 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre pero aun no tiene hijos, ella nació en la ciudad del Maranura pero actualmente vive en la ciudad de Yucay de la provincia de Urubamba. Su actividad económica principal es la venta de materiales de construcción. Ya son varios años que se dedica  al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Reyna de los Angeles” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar arena, ladrillos, piedra chancada y otras cosas  más.
texts.en:
Margot is 40 years old.  She is in a common-law relationship but does not yet have children. She was born in the city of Maranura, but currently lives in the city of Yucay in Urubamba province. 

Her principal livelihood is the sale of construction materials. She has been in this business for several years now, and it is going very well thanks to the effort she puts into her work. 

She belongs to the "Reyna de los Angeles" communal bank, and on this occasion needs the loan to buy sand, bricks, crushed stone and other materials.

loans.use: To buy sand, bricks, crushed stone and other materials.

loans.name: Cinthia

texts.es: Cinthia tiene 23 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo, ella nació en la ciudad de Quillabamba pero actualmente vive en la ciudad de Urubamba de la provincia de Urubamba. Su actividad económica principal es la venta de productos de primera necesidad como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar, fideos, aceite, pan, refrescos, conservas y otras cosas más, y la crianza de animales menores como cuyes y gallinas. Ya son varios años que se dedica  al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Reyna de los Angeles” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar sacos de arroz y sacos de azúcar para abastecer la tienda.
texts.en:
Cinthia is 23 years old and is in a common-law relationship from which she had her son. She was born in the city of Quillabama but currently lives in the city of Urubamba of the Urubamba province. Her principle economic activities are selling staple products like corn, sugar, noodles, cooking oil, bread, soda, canned foods and other things, as well as raising small animals like guinea pigs and chickens. 

She's been doing business for a few years now, and it's going well thanks to the effort she puts into her work. Cinthia belongs to the "Queen of the Angels" communal bank, and for this cycle, she needs a loan to buy sacks of rice and sugar to stock her store.

loans.use: buy bags of rice and sugar to stock her store.

loans.name: Trinidad

texts.es:
Trinidad tiene 59 años de edad, es casado y tiene 3 hijos y vive en una aldea que pertenece a la ciudad de Choloma, Cortes.
Don Trinidad se dedica a una actividad que es hacer lazos, cabuyas y hamacas. Lleva ejerciendo esta actividad desde hace 26 años. Este negocio le ha permitido mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia. Y con los financiamientos que ODEF le ha proporcionando ha logrado mantener estable su negocio.
Ha decidido solicitar un tercer préstamo a ODEF el cual es por 21,000 lempiras, y lo utilizara para  comprar materiales (cabuya) para elaborar lazos y hamacas para la venta.
Su meta es mejorar su negocio para que sus ingresos sean rentables y darle un mejor nivel de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Trinidad is 59 years old, married, and has three children. He lives in a neighborhood in the city of Choloma, Cortes.

Don Trinidad has a business that involves making rope, agave cord, and hammocks. He has been in this line of work for 26 years. This business enables him to improve his quality of life and that of his family. With the loans provided by ODEF, Trinidad has been able to maintain a stable business.

He is requesting his third loan from ODEF in the amount of 21,000 HNL. The money will be used to buy material (agave fiber) for making ropes and hammocks that he can sell. His goal is to improve his business so that it will generate a profitable income which will result in a better standard of living for his family.

loans.use: to buy agave fiber for making ropes and hammocks.

loans.name: Inti Pakareq Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “INTI PAKAREQ”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.                                                                                                                                                                                             

La socia es la Sra. Ruth Julieta ella es soltera y tiene 56 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de tejidos y textiles, la socia fabrica tejidos como chompas y chalinas y también textiles en base a hilos y lanas, la socia luego los vende en las diferentes tiendas donde venden artesanías, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 7 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, en sus tiempos libres a la socia le gusta salir a pasear con sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de textiles y tejidos. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar lanas e hilos de colores. 
 Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de alfombras, negocio de venta de cortinas, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de artesanías.

 
La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members are part of the Communal Bank “Inti Pakareq”, which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

One of the members is Sra. Ruth Julieta. She is 56 years old, single, and has two children. Ruth produces woven articles, such as sweaters and scarves, out of thread and wool. She distributes her products to different stores that sell handicrafts. Ruth works from 8:00 A.M. to 7:00 P.M. She has been in this business for seven years and is doing very well. In her free time, Ruth enjoys going for walks with her children. Her dream is to expand her textile and weaving business.

Ruth is requesting a loan so that she can buy wool and thread in different colors. The other members engage in business activities such as selling rugs, selling curtains, managing a grocery store, and selling handicrafts.

Ruth is grateful to those who have helped to fulfill her dream in this manner. Therefore, she promises to complete her payments according to the established terms.

loans.use: to buy wool and thread in different colors.

loans.name: Luis Arturo

texts.es:
Luis tiene 19 años de edad estado civil soltero vive con sus padres vive en el Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar.

La V.R.C Santa Martha está conformada por 13 que son de la misma comunidad a 40 minutos de la oficina, se dedica a la agricultura.

Luis se dedica a venta de naranjilla. Se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de naranjilla. Además se dedica a la crianza de ganado. Utilizara el dinero del crédito para comprar fertilizantes, insumo para la naranjilla, urea. 

Con el crédito que le otorga la cooperativa es fortalecer los cultivos y aumentar mi capital. Sus compras las realiza en el cantón Guaranda. 

El sueño es aumentar el capital. Los desafíos a los que se enfrentan son el no tener medio de transporte y las plagas en la agricultura. En el tiempo libre se dedica a salir hacer ejercicios.
texts.en:
Luis is a single 19 year old who lives with his parents in the Guaranda district of the Bolívar province. Luis does farming. He harvests and sells naranjilla fruits, and he also raises livestock. Luis will use the money from the loan to buy fertilizers, supplies for the naranjilla crops, and urea, and he makes his purchases in the Guaranda district.

The V.R.C Santha Martha is a communal bank comprised of 13 people that are from the same community located 40 minutes from the office. The credit granted by the cooperative is to strengthen the crops and increase his capital. 

Luis's dream is to increase his resources. The challenges he faces are fears of not having transportation and pests in the crops. In his free time, Luis likes to go out and do exercise.

loans.use: buy fertilizers, supplies for the naranjilla crops, and urea.

loans.name: Macaria

texts.es: Macaria tiene 73 años de edad y es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene siete hijos, ella nació en la ciudad de Urubamba y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació. Su actividad económica principal es la venta de chicha de jora y también la venta de carbón. Ya son varios años que se dedica  al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Reyna de los Angeles” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar carbón.
texts.en:
Macaria is 73 years old, married, and has seven children. She was born in the city of Urubamba and still lives there. Her main business activity is selling “chicha de jora” (a beverage made from corn), but she also sells charcoal. Macaria has been in business for several years and is doing well thanks to the effort she puts into her work. She is a member of the Communal Bank “Reyna de Los Angeles”.

Macaria is taking this opportunity to request a loan in order to buy charcoal.

loans.use: to buy charcoal.

loans.name: Mónica Edith

texts.es:
La Señora. Mónica forma parte del banco comunal María Reina de la Paz  desde hace varios años atrás, en el que ha formado una muy buen amistad con todas sus compañeras. Vive por la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad esta  bañada por 4 ríos, tiene varios lugares para disfrutar de la naturaleza, su gente conserva su cultura, tradiciones y su rica gastronomía.

La Señora. Mónica, tiene 37 años de edad, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 4 hijos de 19, 16, 13 y 9 años de edad, su primera hija trabaja y le ayuda económicamente, sus dos hijos siguientes estudian en colegio y su último hijo estudia en una escuelita de la localidad. Su esposo labora en una empresa como empleado privado, no tienen casa propia por lo que vive en casa de sus suegros pero de manera independiente.

La Señora Mónica labora todos los días de la semana en la atención de un atienda la cual tiene hace 8 años, también realiza buffet y arregla salones para eventos sociales. Todas estas actividades le permiten tener su independencia económica para sacar a su familia adelante.

Como ella es una mujer emprendedora su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de ropa interior para incursionar en este nuevo negocio.
texts.en:
Sra. Mónica joined the “María Reina de La Paz” (Mary, Queen of Peace) Communal Bank several years ago and has formed a great friendship with all of the other members. She lives in the city of Cuenca, which is surrounded by four rivers. There are several places where one can enjoy the natural beauty. The people have preserved their culture, their traditions, and their rich cuisine.

Sra. Mónica is 37 years old, married, and has four children (ages 19, 16, 13, and 9). Her oldest daughter works and helps out financially. The next two children are in high school and the youngest son attends an elementary school in the city. Her husband works for a company as a private employee. They do not own a home, so they are currently living independently at the house of her in-laws.

Sra. Mónica works every day and has been managing her store for eight years. She also prepares buffets and banquet decorations for social events. All of these business activities enable her to be financially independent so that she can help her family get ahead.

Being an enterprising woman, Mónica will invest her loan in the purchase of undergarments so that she can start a new business.

loans.use: to buy undergarments to sell.

loans.name: Maria Dolores

texts.es:
María tiene 34 años de edad de estado civil soltera tiene un hijo, vive con la madre y el hijo en la ciudad de Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar.

La VRC Mushuc Pakari esta conformada por 10 socios, se dedican a la agricultura a 40 minutos de la oficina.

María se dedica a la ganadería y la agricultura. Las compras y las ventas los realiza en Guaranda. Solicita el crédito para comprar ganado,ovejas,pollos, cerdos. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá mejorar la estabilidad económica.

El sueño es poder comprase una casa con jardín. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es la competencia y el mal clima.
En el tiempo libre le gusta pasar con la familia.

"Esta muy agradecida por el crédito anterior".
texts.en:
María Dolores is a 34 year old single mother of one son, and they live in the city of Guaranda, in the province of Bolívar. She farms and raises livestock, and she makes her purchases and sales in Guaranda. 

The VRC Mushuc Pakari cooperative is comprised of 10 members that do farming 40 minutes away from the office. María is asking for the loan to buy cattle, sheep, chickens, and pigs. With the help of this loan, she'll be able to improve her economic stability. Her dream is being able to buy herself a house with a garden. The challenges she faces are competition and bad climate.

María likes to spend her free time with her family. She is very grateful for the previous loan.

loans.use: buy cattle, sheep, chicken, and pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for fruit to sell

loans.name: Julie

texts.en:
This is Julie, 34, a resident of Dasmarinas, Cavite, Philippines. She manages her own household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for her everyday expenses. 
 
Julie operates a community pharmacy store. She retails basic medicines and vitamins to the community. She earns money by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of PHP 500 in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 10,000 loan. She will be using the loan to buy additional stocks of medicine and mineral water to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. 

Julie hopes to be able to expand soon and dreams of opening a restaurant someday. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To purchase additional stocks of medicine for  her business.

loans.name: Benita

texts.en:
This is Benita, 40, a resident of Bacoor, Cavite City, Philippines. Her husband is Teodoro, her business partner, and she is a mother to her children. She, together with her husband and children, manages the household while operating the business.

Benita operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is basically a small convenience store, which retails groceries, toiletries and beverages piecemeal to the local neighborhood. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, a PHP 5-worth of cooking oil, or an egg. She earns by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. She also sells and repacks mung beans for additional income. Her store is located adjacent to her house. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of PHP 600 in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 12,000 loan. She will be using the loan to buy groceries, toiletries and beverages to expand her product inventory and to pay for the maintenance of her sewing machine. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. 

Benita hopes her business will grow and dreams of being able to give her children a good and high quality education through all her hard work on her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items and products to sell and to maintain her sewing machine

loans.name: Nena

texts.en:
This is Nena. She previously accessed a 15,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase more quantities and varieties of grocery items and products needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help for the education of her children and in their personal, household and business expenditures. 

She would like to apply for another 20,000 PHP loan to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add to her inventory. The more items displayed at the store, the better. More items to sell will result in better profit. Her profits from her business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs and the educational expenses of her children.
